quotes.text: I am Classic Rock Revisited. I revisit it every waking moment of my life because it has the spirit and the attitude and the fire and the middle finger. I am Rosa Parks with a Gibson guitar.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: And the attitude of faith is the very opposite of clinging to belief, of holding on.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: Being a sex symbol has to do with an attitude, not looks. Most men think it's looks, most women know otherwise.
quotes.author: Kathleen Turner

quotes.text: I am responsible. Although I may not be able to prevent the worst from happening, I am responsible for my attitude toward the inevitable misfortunes that darken life.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.text: No rational argument will have a rational effect on a man who does not want to adopt a rational attitude.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.text: When I was a child I asked my mother what homosexuality was about and she said - and this was 100 years ago in Germany and she was very open-minded - 'It's like hair color. It's nothing. Some people are blond and some people have dark hair. It's not a subject.' This was a very healthy attitude.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: Obama does not represent America. Nor does he represent anything what our forefathers stood for. This country is basically built on an attitude. It's a way of life. It's not because you're born here. It's not that you're supposed to take from those who have and give to those who haven't. That kills a country. It killed Russia.
quotes.author: Luke Scott

quotes.text: Stop this attitude that older people ain't any good anymore! We're as good as we ever were - if we ever were any good.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: My attitude to peace is rather based on the Burmese definition of peace - it really means removing all the negative factors that destroy peace in this world. So peace does not mean just putting an end to violence or to war, but to all other factors that threaten peace, such as discrimination, such as inequality, poverty.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: Crime is terribly revealing. Try and vary your methods as you will, your tastes, your habits, your attitude of mind, and your soul is revealed by your actions.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.text: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner right there.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.text: The minute you try to talk business with him he takes the attitude that he is a gentleman and a scholar, and the moment you try to approach him on the level of his moral integrity he starts to talk business.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.text: Stiletto, I look at it more as an attitude as opposed to a high-heeled shoe.
quotes.author: Lita Ford

quotes.text: If somebody says no to you, or if you get cut, Michael Jordan was cut his first year, but he came back and he was the best ever. That is what you have to have. The attitude that I'm going to show everybody, I'm going to work hard to get better and better.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: What matters to me is that I do what I think is right and I see, I'm a numbers guy, that's my attitude. I know we have a debt tsunami coming, we are bankrupting this country and I'm in a position where I can actually advance ideas to prevent that from happening. That's exactly what I should be doing.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: I developed a nutty attitude where I'd think, If some guy really loves me he doesn't care if I'm fat. I'd come up with all these stupid reasons why it would be OK to be fat.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.text: Really you just gotta keep chugging along and keep a positive attitude and get through all the problems. You gotta face them, otherwise you don't get through.
quotes.author: Lesley Gore

quotes.text: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: Americans are the most generous country on the planet. I've worked in Europe, I've worked in Australia. There is no where else where you get absolutely no attitude for being a foreigner. If you do your job well, they embrace you.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: When I go to the clinic next and sit with a tube in my arm and watch the poison go in, I'm in an attitude of abject passivity. It doesn't feel like fighting at all it just feels like submitting.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: Our judgments judge us, and nothing reveals us, exposes our weaknesses, more ingeniously than the attitude of pronouncing upon our fellows.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.text: Pessimism only describes an attitude, and not facts, and hence is entirely subjective.
quotes.author: Francis Parker Yockey

quotes.text: I was kicked out of school because of my attitude. I was not assimilating. So I went to work, taking any jobs I could get.
quotes.author: Richard Pryor

quotes.text: A lot of times I find that people who are blessed with the most talent don't ever develop that attitude, and the ones who aren't blessed in that way are the most competitive and have the biggest heart.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.
quotes.author: Gail Porter

quotes.text: I separated from the Southern Baptists when they adopted the discriminatory attitude towards women, because I believe what Paul taught in Galatians that there is no distinction in God's eyes between men and women, slaves and masters, Jews and non-Jews - everybody is created equally in the eyes of God.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.text: My attitude toward men who mess around is simple: If you find 'em, kill 'em.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.text: Prayer is talking with God. God knows your heart and is not so concerned with your words as He is with the attitude of your heart.
quotes.author: Josh McDowell

quotes.text: You can't study comedy it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.text: You call to a dog and a dog will break its neck to get to you. Dogs just want to please. Call to a cat and its attitude is, 'What's in it for me?'
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.text: The compulsion to do good is an innate American trait. Only North Americans seem to believe that they always should, may, and actually can choose somebody with whom to share their blessings. Ultimately this attitude leads to bombing people into the acceptance of gifts.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.text: I keep guitars that are, you know, the neck's a little bit bent and it's a little bit out of tune. I want to work and battle it and conquer it and make it express whatever attitude I have at that moment. I want it to be a struggle.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: Most of my arguments with musicians through the years have had more to do with their attitude about music, or their attitude about their own lives, or their personal responsibility. Music has never really been the big centerpiece of the fight.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.text: I love everybody. One of the great things about me is that I have a very positive attitude.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: Mankind's true moral test, its fundamental test (which lies deeply buried from view), consists of its attitude towards those who are at its mercy: animals. And in this respect mankind has suffered a fundamental debacle, a debacle so fundamental that all others stem from it.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: Punk was defined by an attitude rather than a musical style.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: It's a fundamental, social attitude that the 1% supports symphonies and operas and doesn't support Johnny learning to program hip-hop beats. When I put it like that, it sounds like, 'Well, yeah,' but you start to think, 'Why not, though?' What makes one more valuable than another?
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: I think people feel threatened by homosexuality. The problem isn't about gay people, the problem is about the attitude towards gay people. People think that all gays are Hannibal Lecters. But gay people are sons and daughters, politicians and doctors, American heroes and daughters of American heroes.
quotes.author: Hollis Stacy

quotes.text: I have this theory that, depending on your attitude, your life doesn't have to become this ridiculous charade that it seems so many people end up living.
quotes.author: Christian Bale

quotes.text: It was just like a dream. I could have ended up with an album that's not all that different from anything else coming out of Nashville. Mutt made the difference. He took these songs, my attitude, my creativity, and colored them in a way that is unique.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.text: I look at Jagger and the like and if I see a good attitude I'll admire it but I wouldn't copy their style.
quotes.author: Michael Hutchence

quotes.text: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.text: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: Not every religion has to have St. Augustine's attitude to sex. Why even in our culture marriages are celebrated in a church, everyone present knows what is going to happen that night, but that doesn't prevent it being a religious ceremony.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: Never refuse an assignment except when there is a conflict of interest, a potential of danger to you or your family, or you hold a strongly biased attitude about the subject under focus.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.text: We can revolutionize the attitude of inner city brown and black kids to learning. We need a civil rights movement within the African-American community.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.text: It's a question of keeping one's eyes and ears open and watching how other people play the game. They're watching me too, to see what my attitude is like.
quotes.author: Charles Dance

quotes.text: Yes, we're still five little people with a noisy attitude.
quotes.author: Angus Young

quotes.text: In individual industries where female labour pays an important role, any movement advocating better wages, shorter working hours, etc., would not be doomed from the start because of the attitude of those women workers who are not organized.
quotes.author: Clara Zetkin

quotes.text: On 'Van Halen,' I was a young punk, and everything revolved around the fastest kid in town, gunslinger attitude. But I'd say that at the time of 'Fair Warning,' I started concentrating more on songwriting. But I guess in most people's minds I'm just a gunslinger.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.text: Design is about point of view, and there should be some sort of woman or lifestyle or attitude in one's head as a designer.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.text: Liberalism is an attitude rather than a set of dogmas - an attitude that insists upon questioning all plausible and self-evident propositions, seeking not to reject them but to find out what evidence there is to support them rather than their possible alternatives.
quotes.author: Morris Raphael Cohen

quotes.text: The Dolls were an attitude. If nothing else they were a great attitude.
quotes.author: Johnny Thunders

quotes.text: I was impressed by Hendrix. His attitude was brilliant. Even the way he walked was amazing.
quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

quotes.text: The best way to inspire people to superior performance is to convince them by everything you do and by your everyday attitude that you are wholeheartedly supporting them.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.text: I think it's your mental attitude. So many of us start dreading age in high school and that's a waste of a lovely life. 'Oh... I'm 30, oh, I'm 40, oh, 50.' Make the most of it.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.text: The attitude that nature is chaotic and that the artist puts order into it is a very absurd point of view, I think. All that we can hope for is to put some order into ourselves.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.text: Britishness is just a way of putting things together and a certain don't care attitude about clothes. You don't care, you just do it and it looks great.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.text: It remains to consider what attitude thoughtful men and Christian believers should take respecting them, and how they stand related to beliefs of another order.
quotes.author: Asa Gray

quotes.text: Surfers have the most attitude.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: I've never run into a guy who could win at the top level in anything today and didn't have the right attitude, didn't give it everything he had, at least while he was doing it wasn't prepared and didn't have the whole program worked out.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.text: That's what I love from metal, and that's what I love from hip-hop. That's what I love from any music that's hard, that's got an edge to it-The attitude in it.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: That attitude that fighting is probably not fair, but you have to defend yourself anyway and damage the enemy, has been profoundly consequential as far as my political activism goes.
quotes.author: June Jordan

quotes.text: Seek out that particular mental attribute which makes you feel most deeply and vitally alive, along with which comes the inner voice which says, 'This is the real me,' and when you have found that attitude, follow it.
quotes.author: James Truslow Adams

quotes.text: People think, 'She's a model. She must have such an attitude. She must be so stuck up.' But I'm normal. I cry. I'm not rich. I drive a 1987 Chevrolet Celebrity.
quotes.author: Summer Altice

quotes.text: My grandfather was a man, when he talked about freedom, his attitude was really interesting. His view was that you had obligations or you had responsibilities, and when you fulfilled those obligations or responsibilities, that then gave you the liberty to do other things.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.text: I think failure is nothing more than life's way of nudging you that you are off course. My attitude to failure is not attached to outcome, but in not trying. It is liberating. Most people attach failure to something not working out or how people perceive you. This way, it is about answering to yourself.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.text: Part of our western outlook stems from the scientific attitude and its method of isolating the parts of a phenomenon in order to analyze them.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.text: There is a single thread of attitude, a single direction of flow, that joins our present time to its early burgeoning in Mediterranean civilization.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.text: We live in a country that used to have a can-do attitude, and now we have a 'what-can-you-do-for-me?' attitude, and what I try to do is find ways that we can develop common ground.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.text: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.text: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: An attitude to life which seeks fulfillment in the single-minded pursuit of wealth - in short, materialism - does not fit into this world, because it contains within itself no limiting principle, while the environment in which it is placed is strictly limited.
quotes.author: E. F. Schumacher

quotes.text: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: What was past was past. I suppose that was the general attitude.
quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

quotes.text: Iraq is just a symbol of the attitude of western democracies to the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.text: I don't mean this in a stuck-up way, but I needed an attitude song.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: I met my grandfather just before he died, and it was the first time that I had seen Dad with a relative of his. It was interesting to see my own father as a son and the body language and alteration in attitude that comes with that, and it sort of changed our relationship for the better.
quotes.author: Christian Bale

quotes.text: I don't think it's a good attitude in your life to feel that you have to be rich to have self-esteem.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.text: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.
quotes.author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

quotes.text: An aristocratic culture does not advertise its emotions. In its forms of expression it is sober and reserved. Its general attitude is stoic.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.text: I was impressed by Hendrix. Not so much by his playing, as his attitude - he wasn't a great player, but everything else about him was brilliant.
quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

quotes.text: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: You know, I always say white is not a colour, white is an attitude, and if you haven't got trillions of dollars in the bank that you don't need, you can't be white.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: Being a part of SKECHERS is exciting. It is such a hip company with a great attitude and image.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.text: It is precisely the purpose of the public opinion generated by the press to make the public incapable of judging, to insinuate into it the attitude of someone irresponsible, uninformed.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.text: Coaches will eventually notice a great attitude, and they respect that.
quotes.author: Heather O'Reilly

quotes.text: The novelist teaches the reader to comprehend the world as a question. There is wisdom and tolerance in that attitude. In a world built on sacrosanct certainties the novel is dead.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: No one's going to be able to operate without a grounding in the basic sciences. Language would be helpful, although English is becoming increasingly international. And travel. You have to have a global attitude.
quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

quotes.text: My second husband believed I had such a fickle attitude to friendship that each Friday he would update the list of my 'Top Ten' friends in the manner of a Top Of The Pops chart countdown.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: If you can kill animals, the same attitude can kill human beings. The mentality is the same which exploits nature and which creates wars.
quotes.author: Satish Kumar

quotes.text: My attitude is, do as much as I can while I'm free. And if I'm arrested I'll still do as much as I can.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.text: There are a lot of movies I'd like to throw away. That's not to say that I went in with that attitude. Any film I ever started, I went in with all the hope and best intentions in the world, but some films just don't work.
quotes.author: Kiefer Sutherland

quotes.text: By making a comeback, I'm changing the attitude of people toward me. If I'd known that people would react so enthusiastically, I'd have done it years ago.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.text: Today, I think the attitude is that governing is not necessarily good politics, and the result is that it's much more partisan and much more divided.
quotes.author: Leon Panetta

quotes.text: That term's definitely got a negative aura to it, because people think a diva is somebody with an attitude who demands things all the time. Of course there is that type of diva, but my idea of a diva has always been a singer - whether male or female - who gets on that stage and captivates you with their presence and their voice.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: Oh, I don't think Tom Sowell would tell anybody to join the administration. That's not his style. But I think his attitude has always been if it had to be done he'd prefer me to do it than somebody else.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.text: The Senator from Massachusetts has given us ample grounds to doubt the judgment and the attitude he brings to bear on vital issues of national security.
quotes.author: Dick Cheney

quotes.text: I perfectly understood President Obama's attitude throughout the French presidential campaign. He had no reason to distance himself from Nicolas Sarkozy. It's the basic solidarity that leaders who worked together owe to each other.
quotes.author: Francois Hollande

quotes.text: I think it has something to do with being British. We don't take ourselves as seriously as some other countries do. I think a lot of people take themselves far too seriously I find that a very tedious attitude.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: I failed the LSAT. Basically, if I had not failed, I'd have been a lawyer and there would be no Spanx. I think failure is nothing more than life's way of nudging you that you are off course. My attitude to failure is not attached to outcome, but in not trying. It is liberating.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.text: My attitude to writing is like when you do wallpapering, you remember where all the little bits are that don't meet. And then your friends say: It's terrific!
quotes.author: Harrison Birtwistle

quotes.text: Liberalism is a really old British tradition and it has a completely different attitude towards the individual and the relationship between the individual and the state than the collectivist response of Labour, and particularly Old Labour, does.
quotes.author: Nick Clegg

quotes.text: I've always had a 'Work hard, play hard' attitude to life - I still do - but sometimes you get involved in something that needs a calm, methodical approach.
quotes.author: Damian Lewis

quotes.text: I've always considered myself to be fiercely patriotic. I love Britain - its history and the down-to-earth attitude people have.
quotes.author: Gary Numan

quotes.text: There is a brief moment when all there is in a man's mind and soul and spirit is reflected through his eyes, his hands, his attitude. This is the moment to record.
quotes.author: Yousuf Karsh

quotes.text: I was fortunate to play for Pete Rose and have teammates like Ken Griffey Sr., Tony Perez and Dave Concepcion. I grew up in the game with a mature attitude. I've always known it was better to be seen and not heard.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.text: I've never been out with any of the cast of Coronation Street. We're all very close friends so it's very much a professional attitude.
quotes.author: Richard Fleeshman

quotes.text: Nothing. We're all friends and friendly. So when the cameras go down, depending on the mood or the nature of the material we're dealing with, there's usually a kind of a prevailing light attitude that's floating around.
quotes.author: Richard Dean Anderson

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: I'm taking a bit of a wait-and-see attitude towards 3D.
quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

quotes.text: My father instilled in me the attitude of prevailing. If there's a challenge, go for it. If there's a wall to break down, break it down.
quotes.author: Donny Osmond

quotes.text: Just as the left has to be more willing to question 'Government knows best,' the right has to rethink its laissez-faire attitude toward government.
quotes.author: Jack Kemp

quotes.text: The attitude of insolent haughtiness is characteristic of the relationships Americans form with what is alien to them, with others.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.text: Although as a sailor I despised politics - for I loved my sailor's life and still love it today - conditions forced me to take up a definite attitude towards political problems.
quotes.author: Fritz Sauckel

quotes.text: How do you nurture a positive attitude when all the statistics say you're a dead man? You go to work.
quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

quotes.text: The pilot looked at his cues of attitude and speed and orientation and so on and responded as he would from the same cues in an airplane, but there was no way it flew the same. The simulators had showed us that.
quotes.author: Alan Shepard

quotes.text: It was my father who instilled the 'never say no' attitude I carry around with me today, and who instilled in me a sense of wonder, always taking us on adventures in the car, never telling us the destination.
quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

quotes.text: I went to England in the '70s, and I was in my early 20s. There was still a residue of that era of being an underclass or colonial. I assume it must have been a more aggressive and prominent attitude 40 years before that, because Australia internationally wasn't regarded as having much cultural value. We were a country full of sheep and convicts.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Rush

quotes.text: For a writer only one form of patriotism exists: his attitude toward language.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.text: Gardening is not trivial. If you believe that it is, closely examine why you feel that way. You may discover that this attitude has been forced upon you by mass media and the crass culture it creates and maintains. The fact is, gardening is just the opposite - it is, or should be, a central, basic expression of human life.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: Becoming an author changes your attitude too. Once you see where books come from, and how they're made, they never seem quite as sacred again.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.text: I was bringing my attitude as a regular person 'cause this is my attitude.
quotes.author: Glenn Danzig

quotes.text: If you can attribute your success entirely to your own mental effort, to your own attitude, to some spiritual essence that you have that is better than other people's, then that must feel pretty good.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.text: I fell in love with Erica Kane the summer before my freshman year of high school. Like all red-blooded teen American boys, I'd come home from water polo practice and eat a box of Entenmann's Pop'Ems donut holes in front of the TV while obsessively fawning over 'All My Children' and Erica, her clothes, and her narcissistic attitude.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: Films for TV have to be much closer to the book, mainly because the objective with a TV movie that translates literature is to get the audience, after seeing this version, to pick up the book and read it themselves. My attitude is that TV can never really be any form of art, because it serves audience expectations.
quotes.author: Michael Haneke

quotes.text: You can't beat the beehive for glam punkette attitude.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.text: I haven't seen Clones, which has been during this period when I haven't seen much of anything, but I did see Phantom Menace, and see my feelings about it - see, first of all, I think that when you make a lot of movies, your attitude about the movies changes.
quotes.author: Lawrence Kasdan

quotes.text: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression.
quotes.author: Sally Kirkland

quotes.text: Epic poetry exhibits life in some great symbolic attitude. It cannot strictly be said to symbolize life itself, but always some manner of life.
quotes.author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quotes.text: When you retire, it's a place in life, a part of the journey. You just don't quit work you develop an attitude where you can do what you please.
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.text: When a parent shows up with an attitude of entitlement, understand that under it is a boatload of anxiety.
quotes.author: Robert Evans

quotes.text: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?
quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

quotes.text: My denial and irresponsible attitude about asthma put me at great risk and caused me so much needless suffering. My hope is that the kids I talk to learn to open up about their asthma, become educated about their condition, and seek help.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.text: Woman must have her freedom, the fundamental freedom of choosing whether or not she will be a mother and how many children she will have. Regardless of what man's attitude may be, that problem is hers - and before it can be his, it is hers alone.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.text: Even as a little child, I've always had that comedian kind of attitude.
quotes.author: Etta James

quotes.text: I mean, the shoe - there is a music to it, there is attitude, there is sound, it's a movement. Clothes - it's a different story. There are a million things I'd rather do before designing clothes: directing, landscaping.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: In just the same way the thousands of successive positions of a runner are contracted into one sole symbolic attitude, which our eye perceives, which art reproduces, and which becomes for everyone the image of a man who runs.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.text: In the late '70s, maybe just before I started, there was still an attitude that if you did film you didn't do TV and vice versa, but that's gone now.
quotes.author: Robert Carlyle

quotes.text: I cannot say that the attitude of the United Nations always is for the Israeli attitude. Israel, I think, has been under severe attacks by members of the United Nations many times.
quotes.author: Ariel Sharon

quotes.text: I love her attitude, but as much as I'd like to bring my medals to a speech or appearance, I never do.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.text: We must advertise to U.S. business that we are there, that our attitude has changed, and that we care. When we are asked to help, we have to perform and provide the right advice.
quotes.author: Lawrence Eagleburger

quotes.text: The American attitude towards efficiency and execution should always underlie architecture.
quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

quotes.text: I have such an extreme attitude about work, where I can just completely be derelict of my responsibilities and then when I am not derelict, I am completely indulged in it. I swing pretty wildly from the two extremes.
quotes.author: Geddy Lee

quotes.text: I have a political attitude, but I'm certainly not a politician.
quotes.author: Kgalema Motlanthe

quotes.text: I think my attitude to human beings has changed since leaving prison.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.text: I went to the Performing Arts School and studied classical ballet. That attitude is something that's put into your head. You are never thin enough.
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.text: I have always detested any departure from reality, an attitude which I relate to my mother's poor mental health.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.text: With just about every player in Australia, his whole goal and ambition is to play for Australia. That's why they're playing first class cricket. It's just a different attitude.
quotes.author: Shane Warne

quotes.text: Right after 'Raymond' I had a world-is-my-oyster attitude, but I found out I don't like oysters. I had this existential emptiness. 'What is my purpose? Who am I?' I had a big identity crisis.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.text: What sculptors do is represent the essence of gesture. What is important in mime is attitude.
quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

quotes.text: It really was hand-to-mouth and you can say, 'Poor little me, how dreadful, what a deprived childhood', but I didn't feel that way at all. It's all about the attitude at home.
quotes.author: Carol Vorderman

quotes.text: Having a clear faith, based on the creed of the church is often labeled today as fundamentalism. Whereas relativism, which is letting oneself be tossed and swept along by every wind of teaching, look like the only attitude acceptable to today's standards.
quotes.author: Joseph Ratzinger

quotes.text: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.text: The characteristic political attitude of today is not one of positive belief, but of despair.
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.text: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Charles Revson

quotes.text: Mainly what I learned from Buddy... was an attitude. He loved music, and he taught me that it shouldn't have any barriers to it.
quotes.author: Waylon Jennings

quotes.text: I think fun is an important part of the entertainment industry, and it should be. Anybody who's not incorporating some of that into their work needs to take a break, go away, and have an attitude adjustment.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.text: I have played on many teams throughout my career, and I know when a team has the tools, and the right positive attitude towards winning.
quotes.author: Boomer Esiason

quotes.text: Vampires are so old that they don't need to impress anyone anymore. They're comfortable in their own skin. It's this enigmatic strength that's very romantic and old-fashioned. I think it goes back to something of a Victorian attitude of finding a strong man who's going to look after his woman.
quotes.author: Stephen Moyer

quotes.text: What I wish I had, is that I wish I was a little more Greek, in that I wish I could lose my North American driven attitude and that I could be a little bit more poetic and laissez faire.
quotes.author: Nia Vardalos

quotes.text: I was always the guy getting kicked out of my classes at school for having an attitude problem.
quotes.author: Chevy Chase

quotes.text: And I tell you, having girls has made me a much better man. I have friends who are fathers, but they only have boys, and they have the same attitude toward women they always had, you know? And I don't play that... My girls, you mess with them? I will bury you underground.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.text: If a person can be said to have the wrong attitude, there is no need to pay attention to his arguments.
quotes.author: John McCarthy

quotes.text: The attitude is we live and let live. This is actually an amazing change in values in a rather short time and it's an example of freedom from religion.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.text: Not to discriminate every moment some passionate attitude in those about us, and in the very brilliancy of their gifts some tragic dividing on their ways, is, on this short day of frost and sun, to sleep before evening.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.text: Players should know that if you can't make the contribution of the winning shot, that your attitude every day when you come to practice, or the positive contribution you make through cheering and keeping up team morale, is just as important in the overall picture.
quotes.author: Sue Wicks

quotes.text: It's not the style that motivates me, as much as an attitude of openness that I have when I go into a project.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.text: The place of chess in the society is closely related to the attitude of young people towards our game.
quotes.author: Boris Spassky

quotes.text: We assume that we've come so far as compassionate citizens of the world if we do choose to read the news, yet the attitude towards life can be one where we put blinders on and forget that there are civil wars going on. It's easy to forget that there are so many people starving to death every single day.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: The jokes are great but what really matters for a comedian is his performance, his whole attitude, and the laughs that he gets between the jokes rather than on top of the jokes.
quotes.author: Jack Dee

quotes.text: There were a few teachers who just did not like me because of my face. Once, I was told to stand in the corner until I cheered up. The attitude was, 'Oh, for God's sake, what's the matter with him?' But it's just a natural expression.
quotes.author: Jack Dee

quotes.text: I'm just part of a tradition of people who aren't pleased. I would never think anyone else who has the same attitude was getting it from me. I'd just think they're... sensible.
quotes.author: Jack Dee

quotes.text: The key to life is your attitude. Whether you're single or married or have kids or don't have kids, it's how you look at your life, what you make of it. It's about making the best of your life wherever you are in life.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.text: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor.
quotes.author: Teri Garr

quotes.text: When a woman puts on a heel, she has a different posture, a different attitude. She really stands up and has a consciousness of her body.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: Whenever I'm having a bad day and have an attitude, I stay home. I keep it at home.
quotes.author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quotes.text: You don't have to have an attitude if you're famous.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: I need that aggressive attitude to play my music and more men have that attitude than women.
quotes.author: Lita Ford

quotes.text: But Jesus changes your attitude towards yourself and towards other people.
quotes.author: Cliff Richard

quotes.text: But I think bands that rolled in with a big attitude, like they were some big deal, I just found that very strange.
quotes.author: Rob Zombie

quotes.text: What irritates me is the bland way people go around saying, 'Oh, our attitude has changed. We don't dislike these people any more.' But by the strangest coincidence, they haven't taken away the injustice the laws are still on the books.
quotes.author: Christopher Isherwood

quotes.text: There is definitely something sexy about a girl with an attitude and a pair of leather pants.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.text: The phenomenon of home schooling is a wonderful example of the American can-do attitude. Growing numbers of parents have become disenchanted with government-run public schools. Many parents have simply taken matters into their own hands, literally.
quotes.author: Steve Forbes

quotes.text: Regardless of what one's attitude towards prohibition may be, temperance is something against which, at a time of war, no reasonable protest can be made.
quotes.author: William Lyon Mackenzie King

quotes.text: At home in Ireland, there's a habit of avoidance, an ironical attitude towards the authority figure.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.text: Even if people do wrong, we're social animals, so what can we do about stopping them doing the same things in future? Saying people are 'bad' or 'evil' is just an unwillingness to engage an unwillingness to try to empathise. That sanctimonious attitude doesn't help anyone.
quotes.author: Denise Mina

quotes.text: People have often asked if I'm gay because I don't go out of my way to spit and scratch and give people attitude.
quotes.author: Jason Bateman

quotes.text: I don't return anybody's calls unless it's going to mean extra money for me. And I've completely cut off all relationships with any friends that I had before the show. And I've copped an attitude.
quotes.author: Mike Judge

quotes.text: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.text: My feelings about my mortality are less selfish than they used to be. I used to affect a cavalier attitude to death now I see it from my son's perspective.
quotes.author: Rufus Sewell

quotes.text: The U.S. tries to provide immigrants who grow up here with a world-class education and imbue them with the can-do attitude that has long defined American innovation.
quotes.author: Gary Locke

quotes.text: The attitude of independence toward a constructed language which all national speakers must adopt is really a great advantage, because it tends to make man see himself as the master of language instead of its obedient servant.
quotes.author: Edward Sapir

quotes.text: I feel like I have as good a shot as anybody out there and I have gotten close in the past, so why not have the attitude that I can come out and play great tennis and maybe even win this tournament.
quotes.author: Michael Chang

quotes.text: Art is the child of Nature yes, her darling child, in whom we trace the features of the mother's face, her aspect and her attitude.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.text: I just think that people take me a little more seriously as a brunette. I don't know if that's just because of a societal preconceived notion that all blondes are stupid, but it's a different kind of attitude.
quotes.author: Kate Bosworth

quotes.text: I came back to performing with a different attitude about performing and myself. I wasn't expecting perfection any more, just hoping for an occasional inspiration.
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.text: The purely agitation attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.text: Animals have a much better attitude to life and death than we do. They know when their time has come. We are the ones that suffer when they pass, but it's a healing kind of grief that enables us to deal with other griefs that are not so easy to grab hold of.
quotes.author: Emmylou Harris

quotes.text: Only one thing can conquer war - that attitude of mind which can see nothing in war but destruction and annihilation.
quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

quotes.text: It's not too good to have this attitude in F1. It could be a disadvantage.
quotes.author: Alain Prost

quotes.text: I just really think every job I do, I get this gypsy attitude to money.
quotes.author: Jessica Brown Findlay

quotes.text: My personal view is that such total planning by the state is an absolute good and not simply a relative good... I do not myself think of the attitude I take as deriving from Marx - though this undoubtedly will be suggested - but from Fichte and Hegel.
quotes.author: John Grierson

quotes.text: There's a punk-rock attitude, clearly, to 'Hated.' There's even a punk-rock attitude to 'The Hangover,' I think. We start the movie with a Glenn Danzig song.
quotes.author: Todd Phillips

quotes.text: The American attitude is 'We're the best'. That's why the NBA guys who come from other countries, the Europeans, all sort of stick together away from the game.

quotes.text: The problem was just a mean attitude that festers and has to be challenged.
quotes.author: Major Owens

quotes.text: I'm not anti-fashion, but I've always had a bit of a punk attitude. That's important, I think. I do my own thing.

quotes.text: To so enter into it in nature and art that the enjoyed meanings of life may become a part of living is the attitude of aesthetic appreciation.
quotes.author: George H. Mead

quotes.text: The traditional Christian attitude toward human personality was that human nature was essentially good and that it was formed and modified by social pressures and training.
quotes.author: Carroll Quigley

quotes.text: My parents have a strong work ethic, but their attitude to life, their philosophy, is: 'whatever makes you happy.'
quotes.author: Sally Hawkins

quotes.text: Bob Altman had this relaxed but serious attitude. Everybody loved him. I wanted him to adopt me.
quotes.author: Steve Buscemi

quotes.text: The pool is terrible, but that doesn't have much to do with my record swims. That's all mental attitude.

quotes.text: Fame can be just so annoying because people are so critical of you. You can't just say, 'hi'. You say hi and people whisper' man did you see the way she said hi? What an attitude.

quotes.text: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.
quotes.author: Warwick Davis

quotes.text: The attitude and capacity of the factory, the old metal table and the new ideas of the wooden furniture quickly and naturally suggested the possibility of metal furniture.

quotes.text: You can measure a programmer's perspective by noting his attitude on the continuing vitality of FORTRAN.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.text: Let us change our traditional attitude to the construction of programs. Instead of imagining that our main task is to instruct a computer what to do, let us concentrate rather on explaining to human beings what we want a computer to do.

quotes.text: It goes without saying that the Jewish people can have no other goal than Palestine and that, whatever the fate of the proposition may be, our attitude toward the land of our fathers is and shall remain unchangeable.

quotes.text: That attitude toward women as objects may have worked for the late Sixties, but it doesn't do so now.

quotes.text: The time I spent thinking about how I was better than somebody else or worrying about somebody else's attitude was time I could put to better use.

quotes.text: I really believe you can predict when someone has a great attitude, a real well of talent.

quotes.text: It is impossible to exaggerate the wide, and widening, gulf between the American attitude on the Iraq war and the view from our friends across the Atlantic.
quotes.author: Nick Clooney

quotes.text: As a team, you need to come from behind every once in awhile just to do it. Good for the attitude. It makes it exciting. And when everybody knows you have to throw it... that makes it fun too.

quotes.text: I hope 'The Voice' has a fifteen-year run, don't get me wrong. But I come from nothing, and maybe it's the Irish in me, but my attitude is always like, 'They'll figure me out soon.'

quotes.text: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.
quotes.author: John Cale

quotes.text: 'UFO's' attitude toward the subject is very similar to mine. It's not an advocacy its philosophy is more 'I want to believe this, but I want it proved.'

quotes.text: The music is first and foremost everything - no egos, no attitude, nothing - it's about the music.

quotes.text: But having said that, there's also a sea change in attitude towards media.

quotes.text: In the West, you have always associated the Islamic faith 100 percent with Arab culture. This in itself is a fundamentalist attitude and it is mistaken.

quotes.text: Jazz in itself is not struggling. That is, the music itself is not struggling... It's the attitude that's in trouble. My plays insist that we should not forget or toss away our history.

quotes.text: As the time goes by, you change, your learn new things, your attitude is different. For the moment, I'm still enjoying ski racing so much that it would be difficult for me to think about ending my career.

quotes.text: My attitude on skis is different now. I have learned to put less pressure on myself and on the edges of my skis when I'm racing, to be keep myself more under control.

quotes.text: Our attitude is that we want to cross over. You can't go on making records just for your own hometown.

quotes.text: I do not share the half-in, half-out attitude to the EU of some in Britain. Britain's place is in Europe.

quotes.text: I think that the U.S. does have this very much more open attitude, and I admire it very much and I think it's very important to the world. But the information and the discussion sometimes come too late, after the effective decision has been made.
quotes.author: E. P. Thompson

quotes.text: The Stones are a different kind of group. I realized that when I joined them. It's not really so much their musical ability, it's just they have a certain kind of style and attitude which is unique.

quotes.text: Even with, or perhaps, because of, this background, I have over the past few years sensed a very dramatic change in attitude on the part of Prince Edward Islanders towards the on-going rush for so-called modernization.

quotes.text: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin.

quotes.text: When I was in my 20s it did occur to me that there was something perverted about an attitude that thought that killing somebody was a minor offence compared to kissing somebody.

quotes.text: You can have a laugh in Los Angeles, or you can weep in Los Angeles, depending on your attitude towards it.

quotes.text: People are patronizing the theatres with renewed enthusiasm - there is an entire picnic-like attitude when families go out to see movies, which is a very good sign. They want to see larger-than-life characters on the big screen and not just watch movies on television or on DVDs.

quotes.text: I just want to go in with the right attitude and from Day 1 make a difference.

quotes.text: The theatre only knows what it's doing next week, not like the opera, where they say: What are we going to do in five years' time? A completely different attitude.
quotes.author: Harrison Birtwistle

quotes.text: I'm not a music lover in the sense that I look for something to have on. I've never had that attitude to music.
quotes.author: Harrison Birtwistle

quotes.text: I think one of the things that language poets are very involved with is getting away from conventional ideas of beauty, because those ideas contain a certain attitude toward women, certain attitudes toward sex, certain attitudes toward race, etc.

quotes.text: When you Google me, you'll find a lot of people don't like Richard Dreyfuss. Because I'm cocky and I present a cocky attitude. But no one has ever disagreed with the notion I represent, that we need more civic education. So far there's 100 percent support for that.
quotes.author: Richard Dreyfuss

quotes.text: My mother, she had a very good attitude toward money. I'm very grateful for the fact that we had to learn to save. I used to get like 50 pence a week, and I'd save it for like five months. And then I'd spend it on Christmas presents. I'd save up like eight pounds. It's nothing, but we did that.
quotes.author: Gemma Arterton

quotes.text: Too many people say to their brokers, I can't deal with this. Take my money. Do what you want. That's the worst attitude you can have.
quotes.author: Maria Bartiromo

quotes.text: If philosophy is practice, a demand to know the manner in which its history is to be studied is entailed: a theoretical attitude toward it becomes real only in the living appropriation of its contents from the texts.

quotes.text: I am shocked by the easy attitude of many in the media towards disclosing our Nation's secrets.
quotes.author: Todd Tiahrt

quotes.text: I always give Lindsay so much credit for her tennis game, for her attitude, for her person, and because of how she deals with all the things. I don't think people give her enough credit for how well she's doing.

quotes.text: I don't know that I have any role models now that are fixed. Definitely my mom - she's the coolest. She's worked really hard her whole life and I just think she's got a great attitude. Moms just know so much it's so silly.

quotes.text: It's tricky. I've never been standing at the top of the tree with tons of money thrown at me. I've never really had a profile. So in a way I have this 'nothing to lose' attitude.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.text: Lead singers not only do the majority of the work, but their personalities are singled out and taken as the general attitude of the unit.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.text: It's better for me to play with guys because Rock 'n' Roll has such an aggressive attitude.
quotes.author: Lita Ford

quotes.text: I think Nina Simone has had an amazing journey. She was spicy and she had attitude and she didn't care, she wanted her money in a paper bag and don't mess with me and I've been doing some research on that so.
quotes.author: Nia Long

quotes.text: I kind of resent this attitude of men that we somehow must always look good.
quotes.author: Sharon Gless

quotes.text: Bambi can't act. Bambi had major attitude.
quotes.author: Treat Williams

quotes.text: I'm a big fan of Courtney Love. I love Hole and I love her acting and I love her attitude. I just hope I never meet her in a dark alley.
quotes.author: Jeff Ross

quotes.text: I do support a sex-positive attitude for young people. Use condoms, that's important. I love the idea that promiscuity can be healthy but it's got some dodgy crevasses. Ooh, that's a bad reference! But it's got some dangerous cavities there. You know what I'm saying.
quotes.author: Rachael Taylor

quotes.text: The war changed everybody's attitude. We became international almost overnight.
quotes.author: W. Averell Harriman

quotes.text: As I wrote, I found that Aibileen had some things to say that really weren't in her character. She was older, soft-spoken, and she started showing some attitude.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.text: I like England more than I did when I left. It's become a bit of a better country in the last ten years, in the attitude of it. A bit more Americanized, which is both good and bad. At least when you order a cup of coffee they don't give you a hard time.
quotes.author: Teddy Thompson

quotes.text: What a stupid attitude we have in this country to personal stories.
quotes.author: Amanda Burton

quotes.text: I have a Woody Allen Jewish attitude to life: that it's all going to be disastrous. That it hasn't all been that way is simply down to some random quirk of fate.
quotes.author: Antony Sher

quotes.text: My attitude toward graduate students was different, I must say. I used graduate students as colleagues: I gave them the best problems to work on, and I encouraged them.
quotes.author: Frank Press

quotes.text: Tommie Aaron taught me how to have a good attitude, to be easy going and not get uptight.
quotes.author: Dale Murphy

quotes.text: In aid, the proper attitude is one omitting gratitude.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.text: In Scotland over many years we have cultivated through our justice system what I hope can be described as a 'culture of compassion.' On the other hand, there still exists in many parts of the U.S., if not nationally, an attitude towards the concept of justice which can only be described as a 'culture of vengeance.'
quotes.author: Keith O'Brien

quotes.text: Any time I need to get a serious attitude adjustment, I put on one of their records, and there are examples there for all time to keep us honest and keep us reaching they'll never be eclipsed.
quotes.author: Benny Green

quotes.text: I always had the attitude that I wanted to throw a no-hitter every game.
quotes.author: Dennis Eckersley

quotes.text: I like actors that are good with pantomime and that can transmit a lot by their presence and attitude more than through their dialogue.
quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

quotes.text: Having a child makes you strong and gives you chutzpah. It relaxed my attitude to the job my center of focus shifted, which I think is very helpful, because even if you're not a very indulgent actor you spend a lot of time thinking about yourself. I don't think that is particularly healthy.
quotes.author: Imelda Staunton

quotes.text: I always said punk was an attitude. It was never about having a Mohican haircut or wearing a ripped T-shirt. It was all about destruction, and the creative potential within that.
quotes.author: Malcolm Mclaren

quotes.text: Sid Vicious began the age of participation in which everyone could be the artist. Sid proved that you don't have to play well to be the star. You can play badly, or not even at all. I endorsed that attitude. If you can't write songs, no problem - simply steal one and change it to your taste.
quotes.author: Malcolm Mclaren

quotes.text: Abhorrence of apartheid is a moral attitude, not a policy.
quotes.author: Edward Heath

quotes.text: Every baseball crowd, like every theatre audience, has its own distinctive attitude and atmosphere.
quotes.author: Bill Veeck

quotes.text: Football is my profession now. I'm getting married in August... It's a new experience for me as someone just getting out of college. I still have the same attitude about football I always had. I play hard. I enjoy practice. I'd rather be throwing in passing drills than sitting around and watching TV.
quotes.author: Doug Flutie

quotes.text: The attitude we have towards our personal pets as opposed to the animals that suffer under the factory farm is hypocritical and delusional.
quotes.author: James Cromwell

quotes.text: Certain kinds of speed, flow, intensity, density of attacks, density of interaction... Music that concentrates on those qualities is, I think, easier achieved by free improvisation between people sharing a common attitude, a common language.
quotes.author: Evan Parker

quotes.text: I saw 'Taxi Driver,' and 'Taxi Driver' kind of saved my life. The scene where Robert De Niro is looking at himself in the mirror saying, 'You talkin' to me? You talkin' to me? Who the hell else are you talkin' to?' That's the scene that changed my life by changing my attitude about acting.
quotes.author: Michael Biehn

quotes.text: I've always been a guy who's pretty supportive, its just my nature, so I came in to the situation with the attitude that I wanted to support Johnny and make it work.
quotes.author: Rick Derringer

quotes.text: I thought I was going to be killed. The casualties were so heavy, it was just a given. I learned to take each day, each mission, as it came. That's an attitude I've carried into my professional life. I take each case, each job, as it comes.
quotes.author: Elliot Richardson

quotes.text: What has happened is that to some degree they have taken an attitude where they don't listen to demos of diverse subject matters. They're looking for demos like the record the guy on the left just did.
quotes.author: Grandmaster Flash

quotes.text: Here you do have forests, where pigs could be raised by letting them root about in the forests for a good part of the year. Therefore, you have a different attitude toward them compared with what continues to exist in the Middle East.
quotes.author: Marvin Harris

quotes.text: The attitude of physiological psychology to sensations and feelings, considered as psychical elements, is, naturally, the attitude of psychology at large.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Wundt

quotes.text: This generation... they have a different attitude. Instead of sitting and watching something, they want to be a part of it - they're very hedonistic and sensual.
quotes.author: Steve Wynn

quotes.text: We have become aware of the responsibility for our attitude towards the dark pages in our history. We have understood that bad service is done to the nation by those who are impelling to renounce that past.
quotes.author: Aleksander Kwasniewski

quotes.text: But I do think that we approach music, in of itself, with a religious attitude.
quotes.author: Jon Fishman

quotes.text: I think that generally music should be a positive thing, I like Bob Marley's attitude: he said that his goal in life was to single handedly fight all the evil in the world with nothing but music, and when he went to a place he didn't go to play, he went to conquer.
quotes.author: Jon Fishman

quotes.text: In 1977, at least, he wished to have people believe that he shared and was proud of an attitude toward women that is not acceptable in a politician. In 2003, all he has said is that he doesn't remember the interview.
quotes.author: Michael Kinsley

quotes.text: You'd like more people to recognise what you do is special. But I take the attitude that the best thing I can do for my sport is to be the best at it. The best way people will come to recognise that track and field is a great sport is to see athletes excelling at it. Which is what I intend to do.
quotes.author: Maurice Greene

quotes.text: So at a time in which the media give the public everything it wants and desires, maybe art should adopt a much more aggressive attitude towards the public. I myself am very much inclined to take this position.
quotes.author: Thom Mayne

quotes.text: Modern Orthodoxy has a highly positive attitude toward the State of Israel. Our Ultra-Orthodox brethren recognize only the Holy Land, but not the state.
quotes.author: Norman Lamm

quotes.text: I just try to try to keep an attitude that I don't know what I'm doing. Not to the point where I'm beating myself up, but I just go in thinking that I have a lot to learn. And I hope I still have that attitude 30 years from now.
quotes.author: Tobey Maguire

quotes.text: I'm not going to take this defeatist attitude and listen to all this crap any more from all these people who have nothing except doomsday to predict.
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: A series of rumors about my attitude, as well as derogatory remarks about myself and my family showed me that the personal resentment of the Detroit general manager toward me would make it impossible for me to continue playing hockey in Detroit.
quotes.author: Ted Lindsay

quotes.text: Before 'Gangnam Style' I was not a good attitude artist.
quotes.author: PSY

quotes.text: Women didn't want to be on the stage with other women because they didn't want their bodies to be compared. They didn't want another female act opening for them because of this weird competitive and tokenistic attitude.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.text: Listen, whatever makes the movie better. That's the attitude you have to have.
quotes.author: Joseph Kosinski

quotes.text: Reason is an action of the mind knowledge is a possession of the mind but faith is an attitude of the person. It means you are prepared to stake yourself on something being so.
quotes.author: Michael Ramsey

quotes.text: Hardboiled crime fiction came of age in 'Black Mask' magazine during the Twenties and Thirties. Writers like Dashiell Hammett and Raymond Chandler learnt their craft and developed a distinct literary style and attitude toward the modern world.
quotes.author: Charles Frazier

quotes.text: I don't think people are fools, and I think they deserve a good attitude and smart entertainment.
quotes.author: Tatyana Tolstaya

quotes.text: Hollywood's a very weird place. I think there's less of everything except for attitude.
quotes.author: Dean Cain

quotes.text: My agent says that I'm a 'repeat business guy.' If you hire me to come do a movie, I'll be on time, know all my material, be ready to go, have a good attitude. I'm here to work, so I get hired over and over again by the same producers. If you just be a team player on set you can work so much more often.
quotes.author: Dean Cain

quotes.text: What do you mean by faith? Is faith enough for Man? Should he be satisfied with faith alone? Is there no way of finding out the truth? Is the attitude of faith, of believing in something for which there can be no more than philosophic proof, the true mark of a Christian?
quotes.author: Clifford D. Simak

quotes.text: I still have a young attitude.
quotes.author: Pat Morita

quotes.text: Elvis Costello had a brand new bag. He was a musician, but he knew all about the attitude part of it.
quotes.author: Nick Lowe

quotes.text: The world is full of musicians who can play great, and you wouldn't cross the road to see them. It's people who have this indefinable attitude that are the good ones.
quotes.author: Nick Lowe

quotes.text: After working for years in Hollywood where the actors have taken over, it was a real relief to get down there and not only have some children, but also have some actors that had no attitude.

quotes.text: When you are facing the wilderness on your own, you have a totally different attitude to someone who works in government or who has a monthly cheque.

quotes.text: If you take the contempt some Americans have for yuppies and multiply it by 10 you might come close to understanding their attitude towards the City, as they call it - London, the people of the south.
quotes.author: Martin C. Smith

quotes.text: If you go on stage with the wrong attitude, or something in your performance is off, you can lose an audience in the first minute. That first minute is crucial.
quotes.author: Allan Carr

quotes.text: We can do better in higher education. And it is more than just technology. It's also an attitude on the part of faculty. We need to think through how we can produce a better quality product at less cost.
quotes.author: Roy Romer

quotes.text: In terms of work I've always had a Bad Attitude in that I won't work anywhere which requires me to work strict hours or follow a dress code. I don't know if that's an Asperger's thing or not, I think it's just being reasonable.
quotes.author: Bram Cohen

quotes.text: Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws.
quotes.author: Stuart Chase

quotes.text: Look, everything that you experience as a kid is the foundation of how you are today. I was brought up in a working class family in Leeds and when it comes to money both my parents worked hard and instilled the same attitude into me.
quotes.author: Melanie Brown

quotes.text: With my talent, I can make people laugh and give them another attitude about life. What a blessing that is for me.
quotes.author: Doris Roberts

quotes.text: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
quotes.author: Alicia Witt

quotes.text: When I first left university, I thought about going into the private sector. But I discovered when I went to interview that I could only have a career in the back office, or doing HR. The attitude was, 'My dear lady, you cannot possibly think about going on the board.'

quotes.text: It got very tedious saying the same jokes in the same way with the same attitude.
quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

quotes.text: In regard to music, I just think that it's always best to have an attitude of being a perpetual student and always look to learn something new about music, because there's always something new to learn.
quotes.author: David Sanborn

quotes.text: Canadians tend to be a bit more religious than most Europeans - though not more than the Poles or Ukrainians. Most important, their attitude to immigration and ethnic minorities is more positive than that of most Europeans.
quotes.author: Timothy Garton Ash

quotes.text: The townspeople outside the reservations had a very superior attitude toward Indians, which was kind of funny, because they weren't very wealthy they were on the fringes of society themselves.
quotes.author: James Welch

quotes.text: The money is in a different league these days, of course, but I have special memories of the 60s and 70s which players today don't have. There wasn't the same celebrity attitude and media exposure. We had a bit more freedom.
quotes.author: Peter Shilton

quotes.text: My attitude about Hollywood is that I wouldn't walk across the street to pull one of those executives out of the snow if he was bleeding to death. Not unless I was paid for it. None of them ever did me any favors.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.text: All ideas come about through some sort of observation. It sparks an attitude some object or emotion causes a reaction in the other person.
quotes.author: Graham Chapman

quotes.text: There are a lot of female artists my age around at the moment, but they're all American and blonde and blue-eyed and smiley. I'm totally the opposite of that. I want to show a bit more attitude and I have an opinion.

quotes.text: I try and have a relaxed attitude and stay quite switched off until about an hour before kick-off.
quotes.author: Roy Keane

quotes.text: I think it has other roots, has to do, in part, with a general anxiety in contemporary life... nuclear bombs, inequality of possibility and chance, inequality of goods allotted to us, a kind of general racist, unjust attitude that is pervasive.
quotes.author: Leonard Baskin

quotes.text: There has been a change in attitude, though.
quotes.author: Daniel Petrie

quotes.text: I want to work with kids and help develop them, show them the right way, the right morals and attitude into how to become a better footballer. Australia has many different cultures but I'd like to bring in the indigenous style, bring their competitiveness, athleticism and raw ability into the frame.
quotes.author: Timothy F. Cahill

quotes.text: There is no planning. On the night it is really great, it's euphoria and if it is not so great there is always tomorrow night. That was his attitude.

quotes.text: My grandmother is this amazingly theatrical woman. She acted like a movie star, as far as looks and attitude, kind of like Susan Hayward.

quotes.text: If I don't make the team out of spring training, I'll keep a good attitude. I'll just go polish up the parts of my game that made me not stay in the big leagues.

quotes.text: If a site is done with pleasure and a fun attitude, it's a great way to communicate with your fans.
quotes.author: Christopher Lambert

quotes.text: I know a lot of Eastern Europeans, and because of what they have been through and what they have seen, they have an attitude where they are not easily fooled.
quotes.author: Francine Prose

quotes.text: I always have one or two, sometimes more, Navajo or other tribes' cultural elements in mind when I start a plot. In Thief of Time, I wanted to make readers aware of Navajo attitude toward the dead, respect for burial sites.

quotes.text: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option. We need to change this attitude toward failure - and celebrate the idea that only by falling on our collective business faces do we learn enough to succeed down the road.

quotes.text: I came on to the film with a very happy-go-lucky attitude which I think my character, Charlie, did when she went into the house. I expected it to be good, and then slowly things started to change for us all.

quotes.text: I have the same attitude with work - I like to go to work, I like to work really hard I, like to give everything my all, I like to try things that are new, you know.

quotes.text: There does not seem to be that collegiality I referred to, there seems to be much more of a them versus us attitude, rather than we all have a role to play in this process so let's get on with it.
quotes.author: Len G. Murray

quotes.text: I will not get very far with this attitude.
quotes.author: Nancy Cartwright

quotes.text: Turkey wants a policy of engagement exactly like President Obama's new approach. Policy of engagement, less confrontation, less tense attitude, especially in the region.
quotes.author: Ahmet Davutoglu

quotes.text: I was entirely natural and in many ways I have the same attitude now. I don't mourn the loss of my youth because I believe you should enjoy what you have while you have it.

quotes.text: Our new attitude is how can we put you in front of our customer.
quotes.author: Terry Semel

quotes.text: Unfortunately, the attitude of many towards the press, humanitarians included and especially government workers, is often one of suspicion, if not outright fear.
quotes.author: Alvin Adams

quotes.text: After the first miscarriage, I tried to take the attitude that it was my body's way of telling me that this pregnancy wasn't meant to be.

quotes.text: Nobody minded what you did in bed or what you said about God, a very civilized attitude in 1948.

quotes.text: America won the Cold War by protecting our strategic resources from the threat of foreign control. We must bring the same attitude to our trade relationship with China.

quotes.text: Our spiritual attitude is determined by our conception of our relation to infinite spirit.
quotes.author: Paul Twitchell

quotes.text: It's really interesting with art-movies too, but art especially - to see how your attitude toward artists and works and your level of appreciation of them is always shifting and changing over the years.
quotes.author: Richard Hell

quotes.text: My opponents attitude is, 'If it moves, tax it, if it keeps moving, regulate it and when it stops, subsidize it.
quotes.author: Rob Simmons

quotes.text: The artist is not responsible to any one. His social role is asocial... his only responsibility consists in an attitude to the work he does.

quotes.text: Somehow, the greater the public opposition to the health care bill, the more determined they seem to force it on us anyway. Their attitude shows Washington at its very worst - the presumption that they know best, and they're going to get their way whether the American people like it or not.
quotes.author: Scott Brown

quotes.text: You know, who cares about seeing the girls when everybody wants to see the band. That's what's important, KISS is important. I think we look great, and the attitude is there, and I'm real happy with it.
quotes.author: Eric Carr

quotes.text: Athletic competition clearly defines the unique power of our attitude.
quotes.author: Bart Starr

quotes.text: I'm going to try to enjoy the All-Star break, hope my players reflect on what happened the first half of the season, come back with a different attitude, try to find our solution on how to win it.

quotes.text: I won't say there aren't any Harvard graduates who have never asserted a superior attitude. But they have done so to our great embarrassment and in no way represent the Harvard I know.
quotes.author: Derek Bok

quotes.text: Its attitude, which it has preached and practiced, is skepticism. Now, it finds, the public is applying that skepticism to the press.
quotes.author: Thomas Griffith

quotes.text: Each experience through which we pass operates ultimately for our good. This is a correct attitude to adopt and we must be able to see it in that light.

quotes.text: When I drank, I had a very different attitude towards my playing. It was sloppier but I kind of liked it that way. It was like the alcohol was telling my mind what to do.

quotes.text: I think we're in good hands. There's definitely much more momentum in bringing in good things to help support the show. Everyone's got a good attitude about it and I think that makes all the difference.

quotes.text: That attitude does not exist so much today, but in those days there was a very sharp distinction between basic physics and applied physics. Columbia did not deal with applied physics.

quotes.text: My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.
quotes.author: Jim Dine

quotes.text: The attitude of the people proves that not only do we want to, but that we can succeed in pulling our country out of the difficult position it finds itself in. The banking system of our country will survive and grow.

quotes.text: Patton was living in the Dark Ages. Soldiers were peasants to him. I didn't like that attitude.

quotes.text: Hence, within the space of two generations there has been a complete revolution in the attitude of the trades-unions toward the women working in their trades.

quotes.text: Bader's philosophy was my philosophy. His whole attitude to life was mine.

quotes.text: Americans have always had an ambivalent attitude toward intelligence. When they feel threatened, they want a lot of it, and when they don't, they regard the whole thing as somewhat immoral.

quotes.text: We will see that our new attitude toward liquor has been given to us without any thought or effort on our part. It just comes! That is the miracle of it.

quotes.text: If you eat something and get fat, you should be responsible for it. I think that is the attitude of the great majority of Americans, that you should be responsible for what you eat.

quotes.text: My deepest impulses are optimistic, an attitude that seems to me as spiritually necessary and proper as it is intellectually suspect.

quotes.text: I also had a mistaken attitude towards certain comrades.
quotes.author: Bela Kun

quotes.text: I film quite a bit of footage, then edit. Changes before your eyes, things you can do and things you can't. My attitude is always 'let it keep rolling.'

quotes.text: Muslims have a very bad attitude to homosexuality, they're very intolerant.
quotes.author: Pim Fortuyn

quotes.text: My first feeling about the paper and the attitude is that it is absurd.

quotes.text: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.

quotes.text: I can't believe the pro-choicers attitude toward unborn children-to me it's the ultimate liberal cause, to defend those without a voice.

quotes.text: An attitude of philosophic doubt, of suspended judgment, is repugnant to the natural man. Belief is an independent joy to him.
quotes.author: William Minto

quotes.text: Even when I'm playing someone named Fat Amy, I'm all about confidence and attitude.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: To love beauty is to see light.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.

quotes.text: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.

quotes.text: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives.

quotes.text: Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
