quotes.text: I'm very accepting with my age. It's like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you've become comfortable in your skin.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.text: My wife has brought great beauty into my life. And my daughter has brought me nothing but joy. Those qualities were greatly lacking.
quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

quotes.text: My mother never put an emphasis on looks. She let us grow up on our own time line. She never forced any beauty regimen into my world.
quotes.author: Rachel McAdams

quotes.text: It is very necessary to have markers of beauty left in a world seemingly bent on making the most evil ugliness.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.text: Hollywood needs to recognise all shades of African American beauty.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.text: Editing yourself is like an irksome coin toss. You've got to strip yourself of super ego and operate from the id. Maybe I've got my Freud mixed up. It's just hard to trade a beauty shot for the performance with truth and a brightly lit zit.
quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

quotes.text: Beauty is a radiance that originates from within and comes from inner security and strong character.
quotes.author: Jane Seymour

quotes.text: I tried for a while to be an agricultural worker and was hopelessly bored. To me it was meaningless. I would stand around in heaps of manure and sings about the beauty of the work I wasn't doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Bikel

quotes.text: I tried for a while to be an agricultural worker and was hopelessly bored. I would stand around in heaps of manure and sing about the beauty of the work I wasn't doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Bikel

quotes.text: Art requires philosophy, just as philosophy requires art. Otherwise, what would become of beauty?
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.text: I really like where Tony Robbins says that we're all hypnotized to see beauty this one specific way, and it's true.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: Beauty fades! I just turned 29, so I probably don't have that many good years left in me.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: Beauty, to me is about being comfortable in your own skin.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: You can't possibly fathom the ins and outs of a prepubescent beauty treatment until you've felt the strange but exhilarating tingle of a cottage-cheese-and-Pop-Rocks facial.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text: As Ralph's character begins to discover the political thriller aspect of the film, he falls deeper in love with his wife, so the two run together. That's the beauty of this film. It has fast pace and excitement, but it also has heart and soul.
quotes.author: Rachel Weisz

quotes.text: Beauty can come in strange forms.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.text: And I think of that again as I've written in several of my beauty books, a lot of health comes from the proper eating habits, which are something that - you know, I come from a generation that wasn't - didn't have a lot of food.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: Well I've written four beauty books as well.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: Bologna is the best city in Italy for food and has the least number of tourists. With its medieval beauty, it has it all.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.text: I think we have become obsessed with beauty and personally I'm really saddened by the way women mutilate their faces today in search of that.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.text: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.text: I thought to be feminine was to give in to straight culture, or the beauty standard, but in my heart I had a flair for fashion and style. They were passions I kept secret because I didn't understand I could love clothes and hair and makeup and still like girls.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: Thanks to capitalism, the importance placed on beauty has never been so manipulated. We are the guinea pigs force-fed ads that tell us how pathetic we are: that we will never be loved, happy or valuable unless we have the body, the face, the hair, even the personality that will apparently be ours, if only we buy their products.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: She gave up beauty in her tender youth, gave all her hope and joy and pleasant ways she covered up her eyes lest they should gaze on vanity, and chose the bitter truth.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.text: I really like to be able to have variety and to try different things - that's the beauty of fashion.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.text: Beauty is first and foremost an emotion.
quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quotes.text: It's the beauty and curse of doing a daily show. Some days you've got nothing to talk about and other days Dick Cheney shoots his lawyer in the face and everyone is happy.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.text: The beauty that addresses itself to the eyes is only the spell of the moment the eye of the body is not always that of the soul.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: The trick of this thing and the beauty of this thing is that it's a cowboy movie first and then stuff happens. Even after stuff happens it doesn't change - it hasn't suddenly changed into another kind of movie. It's still a cowboy movie. And that's what's incredible about it because nobody has done that before, that's new territory.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.text: With guys I revere, like Marcus Garvey or Malcolm X, their look is less about style than purpose and the expression of beauty. It wasn't just about being noticed, you know?
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.text: Who knows better than artists how much ugliness there is on the way to beauty, how many ghastly, mortifying missteps, how many days of granitic blockheadedness and dismaying ineptitude there is on the way to accomplishment, how partial all accomplishment is, how incomplete?
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.text: Every man who has shown the world the way to beauty, to true culture, has been a rebel, a 'universal' without patriotism, without home, who has found his people everywhere.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.text: I discovered that the horse is life itself, a metaphor but also an example of life's mystery and unpredictability, of life's generosity and beauty, a worthy object of repeated and ever changing contemplation.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: Beauty comes from a life well lived. If you've lived well, your smile lines are in the right places, and your frown lines aren't too bad, what more do you need?
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: My mother is a big believer in being responsible for your own happiness. She always talked about finding joy in small moments and insisted that we stop and take in the beauty of an ordinary day. When I stop the car to make my kids really see a sunset, I hear my mother's voice and smile.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: The way in which mathematicians and physicists and historians talk is quite different, and what a physicist means by physical intuition and what a mathematician means by beauty or elegance are things worth thinking about.
quotes.author: Clifford Geertz

quotes.text: I know it sounds a bit corny, but I do think that beauty and sexiness come from within.
quotes.author: Rachel Stevens

quotes.text: I love the game, it's the greatest game on earth, that's why I can't understand all of this talk about trying to make the game better. People talk about the high strike zone and changing this and that. Why? To speed up the game? That's the beauty of baseball. There is no time element.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.text: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea.
quotes.author: Craig Bruce

quotes.text: Beauty is as relative as light and dark. Thus, there exists no beautiful woman, none at all, because you are never certain that a still far more beautiful woman will not appear and completely shame the supposed beauty of the first.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.text: Who among us has never looked up into the heavens on a starlit night, lost in wonder at the vastness of space and the beauty of the stars?
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.text: I am an unconventional beauty. I grew up in a high school where if you didn't have a nose job and money and if you weren't thin, you weren't cool, popular, beautiful. I was always told that I wasn't pretty enough to be on television.
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.text: Our situation today shows that beauty demands for itself at least as much courage and decision as do truth and goodness, and she will not allow herself to be separated and banned from her two sisters without taking them along with herself in an act of mysterious vengeance.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.text: For me art and chess are closely related, both are forms in which the self finds beauty and expression.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.text: But I think it is a serious issue to wonder about the other platonic absolutes of say beauty and morality.
quotes.author: Roger Penrose

quotes.text: I was never an ambitious girl, or even a self-confident one. I never went in for beauty pageants or wore a stitch of make-up until I went to Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.text: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
quotes.author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.text: There is a role and function for beauty in our time.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: I like the beauty of Faulkner's poetry. But I don't like his themes, not at all.
quotes.author: Manuel Puig

quotes.text: You get more churches burned down in the United States in the last two years than in the last hundred, because of the lack of understanding of culture and diversity and the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Edward James Olmos

quotes.text: You, too, women, cast away all the cowards from your embraces they will give you only cowards for children, and you who are the daughters of the land of beauty must bear children who are noble and brave.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Garibaldi

quotes.text: All my writing is about the recognition that there is no single reality. But the beauty of it is that you nevertheless go on, walking towards utopia, which may not exist, on a bridge which might end before you reach the other side.
quotes.author: Marguerite Young

quotes.text: I thought it might be a good move to get into a beauty contest so I tried for Miss Pennsylvania and won. I think that helped me get noticed, at least by the people of Pennsylvania.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.text: The beauty of a strong, lasting commitment is often best understood by men incapable of it.
quotes.author: Murray Kempton

quotes.text: What I like about cities is that everything is king size, the beauty and the ugliness.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.text: Beauty is a precious trace that eternity causes to appear to us and that it takes away from us. A manifestation of eternity, and a sign of death as well.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.text: A beautiful bouquet or a long-lasting flowering plant is a traditional gift for women, but I have recommended that both men and women keep fresh flowers in the home for their beauty, fragrance, and the lift they give our spirits.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: Avon invented the concept of direct marketing and direct selling beauty. And that's still very valid to us. We'll have a firm that will be around for another 114 years as strongly as it was the first 114.
quotes.author: Andrea Jung

quotes.text: A representative is free delivery she's a personal beauty consultant. Some people want that high touch.
quotes.author: Andrea Jung

quotes.text: The game in beauty is changing so much, if your product isn't high tech or can't make a unique performance claim - plump your lips, reduce your lines, look glossy, and stay on for 24 hours - you can't go to market today. I'm not just talking about a $20 lipstick, but a $5 lipstick!
quotes.author: Andrea Jung

quotes.text: There are two ways to worry words. One is hoping for the greatest possible beauty in what is created. The other is to tell the truth.
quotes.author: June Jordan

quotes.text: I think the 1970s will always be the decade for me. Obviously, I grew up in that era, but the beauty standard was touchable, kissable.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.text: Faith goes out through the window when beauty comes in at the door.
quotes.author: George Edward Moore

quotes.text: Grandeur and beauty are so very opposite, that you often diminish the one as you increase the other. Variety is most akin to the latter, simplicity to the former.
quotes.author: William Shenstone

quotes.text: Power and beauty come from a very deep place.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.text: Beauty can't amuse you, but brainwork - reading, writing, thinking - can.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.text: Wigs have always been a part of my life and have become a staple accessory in my closet. I can remember being a little girl and hearing all the commotion in my house from my mom, aunts and grandmother when picking out their wigs for the day. It was such a good time for them and part of their everyday beauty routine.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: I think we should all be tolerant of each other and embrace each others' strengths and differences and uniqueness and beauty.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: I have girls who are concerned about how they look compared to models or what have you. It's my responsibility to teach them that beauty is more than superficial.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: The beauty about the D-list is that people who are on it probably don't know they are.
quotes.author: Kathy Griffin

quotes.text: I find, in being black, a thing of beauty: a joy a strength a secret cup of gladness.
quotes.author: Ossie Davis

quotes.text: I'm only wanted by directors for the image I give off, and it makes me angry. I always wanted to be an actor and not a beauty pageant winner.
quotes.author: Jude Law

quotes.text: My idea of beauty is somebody that doesn't have to try too much, someone who is effortless and fresh.
quotes.author: Jessica Ennis

quotes.text: The English Bible - a book which, if everything else in our language should perish, would alone suffice to show the whole extent of its beauty and power.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.text: A supermodel needed to be able to be on 'Sports Illustrated,' to be able to walk runways, to be able to do beauty ads, to be on covers. And the girls now can no longer be on covers and be in the ads because your actresses have taken over all the jobs. I don't know what happened, but we want our jobs back.
quotes.author: Kim Alexis

quotes.text: Familiarity is a magician that is cruel to beauty but kind to ugliness.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.text: There's a beauty in being part of a band, when there's equality and trust.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: I learned the truth at seventeen, That love was meant for beauty queens, And high school girls with clear skinned smiles, Who married young and then retired.
quotes.author: Janis Ian

quotes.text: It's nice to just embrace the natural beauty within you.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: A few years ago I lost 30 pounds, and people still wanted to criticize. And honestly, I'm happy with myself if I'm a little heavier. I realized: 'Why am I trying to conform to someone else's idea of beauty?' I think I'm beautiful either way.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: We have magnificent brains, but we use a great deal of our brilliance to keep ourselves stuck and ignorant, to keep ourselves from not shining. We are so afraid of our beauty and radiance and brilliance because it scared the adults around us when we were children.
quotes.author: Patricia Sun

quotes.text: If I weren't performing, I'd be a beauty editor or a therapist. I love creativity, but I also love to help others. My mother was a hairstylist, and they listen to everyone's problems - like a beauty therapist!
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.text: You don't know what the Chinese expect in the way of beauty. The presentation is just a farce. You come into a room filled with 50 people and they don't talk to you. There's very little interaction.
quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

quotes.text: Los Angeles is like a beauty parlor at the end of the universe.
quotes.author: Emily Mortimer

quotes.text: A special kind of beauty exists which is born in language, of language, and for language.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.text: Beauty must appeal to the senses, must provide us with immediate enjoyment, must impress us or insinuate itself into us without any effort on our part.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.text: The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.text: As an inspiration to the author, I do not think the cat can be over-estimated. He suggests so much grace, power, beauty, motion, mysticism. I do not wonder that many writers love cats I am only surprised that all do not.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.text: I'm proud that today, at 43 years old, I've come to value the aging process and focus on inner rather than outer beauty.
quotes.author: Carre Otis

quotes.text: There's no such thing is aging, but maturing and knowledge. It's beautiful, I call that beauty.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: Not longer loved or fostered by religion, beauty is lifted from its face as a mask, and its absence exposes features on that face which threaten to become incomprehensible to man.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.text: We no longer dare to believe in beauty and we make of it a mere appearance in order the more easily to dispose of it.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.text: I believe every chess player senses beauty, when he succeeds in creating situations, which contradict the expectations and the rules, and he succeeds in mastering this situation.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.text: The development of beauty in chess never depends on you alone. No matter how much imagination and creativity you invest, you still do not create beauty. Your opponent must react at the same highest level.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.text: I really wanted there to be something in my life that I enjoy just for the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.text: The New York City Ballet is obviously speaking to a whole new generation and bringing it the same wonder and beauty that it brought previous generations.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.text: Many a genius has been slow of growth. Oaks that flourish for a thousand years do not spring up into beauty like a reed.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.text: Every performance is different. That's the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.text: My daily beauty regimen is definitely always in the mornings, and at night, always washing my face with a basic cleanser. I also use a moisturizer with SPF to follow up.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.text: We all have to find beauty within us, as opposed to just our exterior.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.text: People tend not to use this word beauty because it's not intellectual - but there has to be an overlap between beauty and intellect.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: One night I'll be in Los Angeles and it'll be a Latin crowd, and then another night I'll go to Fresno and it'll be an all-black crowd. To me, that's the beauty of the music.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.text: That's the beauty of being a comedian - it's the one job you're allowed to do that. We're lucky. We're really lucky.
quotes.author: Colin Quinn

quotes.text: The difference between Marilyn Monroe and the early Pamela Anderson is not that great. What's amazing is that the taste of American men and international tastes in terms of beauty have essentially stayed the same. Styles change, but our view of beauty stays the same.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.text: I felt Joyce was an influence on my fiction, but in a very general way, as a kind of inspiration and a model for the beauty of language.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.text: The beauty of having a producer is that you have someone who says, You're finished.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.text: Comics are so full of amazing work. And I can't look at a drawing of a woman without thinking of, for instance, Wallace Wood and his amazing way of capturing beauty.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.text: I cannot go to Montreal without going to Beauty's, my favorite place for breakfast, where I have the Mish-Mash omelet with hot dogs, salami, eggs, green peppers, and onions, and the best banana bread in the world. It's legendary!
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: Beauty set up distance between other people and me. It warped their behavior.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.text: People see you as an object, not as a person, and they project a set of expectations onto you. People who don't have it think beauty is a blessing, but actually it sets you apart.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.text: A child does not notice the greatness and the beauty of nature and the splendor of God in his works.
quotes.author: Rudolf Otto

quotes.text: Once you go inside and weed through the muck, you will find the real beauty, the truth about yourself.
quotes.author: Lindsay Wagner

quotes.text: I used to wear a lot of red lipstick, and when I got a pimple, I'd cover it up with eyeliner to turn it into a beauty mark.
quotes.author: Selma Blair

quotes.text: I'm flatchested, I'm short, I'm brunette, I have droopy eyes, and so people have a hard time casting me as a 'beauty.'
quotes.author: Selma Blair

quotes.text: Doors open because you're beautiful, but I wouldn't cultivate beauty to the exclusion of brains.
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.text: Beauty lasts five minutes. Maybe longer if you have a good plastic surgeon.
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.text: Beauty is produced by the pleasing appearance and good taste of the whole, and by the dimensions of all the parts being duly proportioned to each other.
quotes.author: Marcus V. Pollio

quotes.text: That's the beauty of music. You can take a theme from a Bach sacred chorale and improvise. It doesn't make any difference where the theme comes from the treatment of it can be jazz.
quotes.author: Dave Brubeck

quotes.text: Asian people have a unique way about them and a different sense of beauty. It's exotic to me. I like they way Asians project their feelings. There's a hardness to the culture, but at the same time there's a delicateness.
quotes.author: Paz Vega

quotes.text: This is the artist, then, life's hungry man, the glutton of eternity, beauty's miser, glory's slave.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.text: Many attempts have been made by writers on art and poetry to define beauty in the abstract, to express it in the most general terms, to find some universal formula for it.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.text: Such discussions help us very little to enjoy what has been well done in art or poetry, to discriminate between what is more and what is less excellent in them, or to use words like beauty, excellence, art, poetry, with a more precise meaning than they would otherwise have.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.text: What is important, then, is not that the critic should possess a correct abstract definition of beauty for the intellect, but a certain kind of temperament, the power of being deeply moved by the presence of beautiful objects.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.text: One of the most beautiful passages of Rousseau is that in the sixth book of Confessions, where he describes the awakening in him of the literary sense. Of such wisdom, the poetic passion, the desire of beauty, the love of art for its own sake, has most.
quotes.author: Walter Pater

quotes.text: I mean the beauty of being a writer is it's not like being a swimmer. When they were talking about our Olympic swimmers and they'd say, 'Oh she's so old,' and she's all of 25 or something. So the beauty for a writer is that you can keep doing it right into your dotage, and I hope to be able to keep doing it as long as I can get away with it, yeah.
quotes.author: Geraldine Brooks

quotes.text: I had a lot of resentment for a while toward Kim Novak. But I don't mind her anymore. She's okay. We've become friends. I even asked her before this trip for some beauty tips.
quotes.author: Kim Novak

quotes.text: But the beauty of Einstein's equations, for example, is just as real to anyone who's experienced it as the beauty of music. We've learned in the 20th century that the equations that work have inner harmony.
quotes.author: Edward Witten

quotes.text: I think beauty comes from within. If you're happy and look at life in the best way you can, even when there are problems, it can make you beautiful on the outside.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.text: I think there's a great beauty to having problems. That's one of the ways we learn.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.text: Truth is a thing immortal and perpetual, and it gives to us a beauty that fades not away in time.
quotes.author: Frank Norris

quotes.text: My quick beauty tip is always have a tinted gloss of some kind to give you some color even if you have no makeup on.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: I think beauty comes from within, and society paints a ridiculous picture.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: My daily beauty regimen consists of washing my face before bed and putting on moisturizer.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: My unusual beauty tip is that I often use Vaseline to take my make up off. It works great and is good for sensitive skin.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: I envy the sensibility in Europe, appreciating beauty in women as they age. I'm going to go that way. I might dye my gray hair for a bit, but beyond that the buck stops. I'm not having any work done.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.text: You may keep your beauty and your health, unless you destroy them yourself, or discourage them to stay with you, by using them ill.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.text: So every creative act strives to attain an absolute status it longs to create a world of beauty to triumph over chaos and convert it to order.
quotes.author: Rowan D. Williams

quotes.text: Oh who can tell the range of joy or set the bounds of beauty?
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.text: Music, as many people have said, is the universal language. Of course points are made which make you think about things, but ultimately it makes you feel. And that's why people remember more songs that have meant something during their life than films. They start to define periods in your life, and that's kind of the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: No single man can be taken as a model for a perfect figure, for no man lives on earth who is endowed with the whole of beauty.
quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

quotes.text: Music, art, theater. I'm just a big fan of beauty.
quotes.author: Jerry Hall

quotes.text: There's a sadness to the human condition that I think music is good for. It gives a counterpoint to the visual beauty, and adds depth to pictures that they wouldn't have if the music wasn't there.
quotes.author: Mike Figgis

quotes.text: The idea that happiness could have a share in beauty would be too much of a good thing.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.text: I remember reminding myself that beauty is an opinion, not a fact. And it has always made me feel better.
quotes.author: Hayden Panettiere

quotes.text: The thought came to me that all one loves in art becomes beautiful. Beauty is nothing but the expression of the fact that something is being loved. Only thus could she be defined.
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.text: I have a real passion for many aspects of home lifestyle and beauty.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.text: The more people explore the world, the more they realize in every country there's a different aesthetic. Beauty really is in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Helena Christensen

quotes.text: There will always be a desire for something new, fresh and innovative, as well as a yearning and respect for timeless elegance and beauty.
quotes.author: Helena Christensen

quotes.text: The difference between utility and utility plus beauty is the difference between telephone wires and the spider web.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.text: I felt I had to share Idaho with my friend from New York because he'd shared New York with me, so I was going to share the beauty of nature with a man who went to museums and clubs late at night. But there was nothing to do where I lived at night.
quotes.author: Mariel Hemingway

quotes.text: Beauty comes from the inside.
quotes.author: Kathy Ireland

quotes.text: The South is very beautiful but its beauty makes one sad because the lives that people live here, and have lived here, are so ugly.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.text: For me, a page of good prose is where one hears the rain and the noise of battle. It has the power to give grief or universality that lends it a youthful beauty.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.text: After 'Freaks and Geeks,' I dealt with several producers who wanted to cover up all my beauty marks, every single mole on my body. They tried to cover them on my first two episodes of 'Dawson's Creek,' and it just looked ridiculous, so I had to put my foot down. But it's not something I'm insecure about.
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.text: I recognize in thieves, traitors and murderers, in the ruthless and the cunning, a deep beauty - a sunken beauty.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.text: As a mom, I don't have much time for beauty.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: The pattern of a newspaperman's life is like the plot of 'Black Beauty.' Sometimes he finds a kind master who gives him a dry stall and an occasional bran mash in the form of a Christmas bonus, sometimes he falls into the hands of a mean owner who drives him in spite of spavins and expects him to live on potato peelings.
quotes.author: A. J. Liebling

quotes.text: The beauty of doing film is that you construct whatever you do block by block and you can build something that will stay.
quotes.author: Michel Gondry

quotes.text: As a girl, you're supposed to love Sleeping Beauty. I mean, who wants to love Sleeping Beauty when you can be Aladdin?
quotes.author: Ellen Page

quotes.text: I believe it's time that women truly owned their superpowers and used their beauty and strength to change the world around them.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.text: Some songs you get. Some songs you may not. And I think that's the beauty of art: to question and to ask, to understand the deeper meaning after two or three or four listenings.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.text: I know that I've got big ears and a big forehead and that my hair sticks up. But I'm happy with myself. I'm not necessarily trying to win a beauty pageant here.
quotes.author: Clay Aiken

quotes.text: My theory of characterization is basically this: Put some dirt on a hero, and put some sunshine on the villain, one brush stroke of beauty on the villain.
quotes.author: Justin Cronin

quotes.text: I think the beauty looks I most regret are those I was persuaded into.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: Physical beauty isn't so impressive to me.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: I love glamour and artificial beauty. I love the idea of artifice and dressing up and makeup and hair.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: My beauty icons are women whose images are self-created.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: I really believe that beauty comes from health - sensible eating and exercise.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: I do not see any beauty in self-restraint.
quotes.author: Mary MacLane

quotes.text: Marriage: love, honor, and negotiate.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.text: I've learned this is a very long marriage doing a television show. I like the people that I work with to be people I enjoy, so you want to cast people who are as excited and enthusiastic as you are.
quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

quotes.text: I am a firm believer in marriage. In the future I will be married.
quotes.author: Elisabetta Canalis

quotes.text: Marriage is one of the most sacred human institutions. I asked our Senators, as many South Dakotans have done, to protect marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
quotes.author: Mike Rounds

quotes.text: Other than marriage, she doesn't control me and I don't control her.
quotes.author: Gavyn Davies

quotes.text: My wife disagrees with 100 percent of what I say. That's the same marriage I have.
quotes.author: Curtis Sliwa

quotes.text: I'm not feeling very well - I need a doctor immediately. Ring the nearest golf course.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: They certainly give very strange names to diseases.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Getting out of the hospital is a lot like resigning from a book club. You're not out of it until the computer says you're out of it.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: Medicine is my lawful wife and literature my mistress when I get tired of one, I spend the night with the other.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: When I was born I was so ugly the doctor slapped my mother.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Doctors are just the same as lawyers the only difference is that lawyers merely rob you, whereas doctors rob you and kill you too.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: The doctor sees all the weakness of mankind the lawyer all the wickedness, the theologian all the stupidity.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Doctors will have more lives to answer for in the next world than even we generals.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: All sorts of computer errors are now turning up. You'd be surprised to know the number of doctors who claim they are treating pregnant men.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Illness is the doctor to whom we pay most heed to kindness, to knowledge, we make promise only pain we obey.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: Three-quarters of the sicknesses of intelligent people come from their intelligence. They need at least a doctor who can understand this sickness.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: A physician's physiology has much the same relation to his power of healing as a cleric's divinity has to his power of influencing conduct.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.text: Modern medicine is a negation of health. It isn't organized to serve human health, but only itself, as an institution. It makes more people sick than it heals.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.text: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.text: I was going to have cosmetic surgery until I noticed that the doctor's office was full of portraits by Picasso.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: As a medical doctor, it is my duty to evaluate the situation with as much data as I can gather and as much expertise as I have and as much experience as I have to determine whether or not the wish of the patient is medically justified.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.text: Time is generally the best doctor.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: My doctor gave me six months to live, but when I couldn't pay the bill he gave me six months more.
quotes.author: Walter Matthau

quotes.text: When I told my doctor I couldn't afford an operation, he offered to touch-up my X-rays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: I was always shocked when I went to the doctor's office and they did my X-ray and didn't find that I had eight more ribs than I should have or that my blood was the color green.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.text: In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man: survival.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.text: The doctors x-rayed my head and found nothing.
quotes.author: Dizzy Dean

quotes.text: I'm 86 and my doctor used to tell me to slow down - at least he did until he dropped dead.
quotes.author: Cesar Romero

quotes.text: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back in the shell.
quotes.author: Cass Canfield

quotes.text: You can die of the cure before you die of the illness.
quotes.author: Michael Landon

quotes.text: People are so afraid of authority figures and doctors are authority figures.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: The physician's highest calling, his only calling, is to make sick people healthy - to heal, as it is termed.
quotes.author: Samuel Hahnemann

quotes.text: It is reasonable to expect the doctor to recognize that science may not have all the answers to problems of health and healing.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: Growing up, my dolls were doctors and on secret missions. I had Barbie Goes Rambo.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.text: When a man goes through six years training to be a doctor he will never be the same. He knows too much.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.text: Flying back from New York, the flight attendant said 'God, I wished you were here yesterday, we had a stroke on the plane. I said, if I have a stroke on a plane, I hope the pretend doctor isn't the one on the plane. I want a real doctor.
quotes.author: Anthony Edwards

quotes.text: America has the best doctors, the best nurses, the best hospitals, the best medical technology, the best medical breakthrough medicines in the world. There is absolutely no reason we should not have in this country the best health care in the world.
quotes.author: Bill Frist

quotes.text: I went to the doctor and he said I had acute appendicitis, and I said compared to who?
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: I'm strongly for a patient Bill of Rights. Decisions ought to be made by doctors, not accountants.
quotes.author: Charles Schumer

quotes.text: I'm by no means condemning prescription medicine for mental health. I've seen it save a lot of people's lives.
quotes.author: Zach Braff

quotes.text: Mammograms are really sort of a gift. You can either catch something early or count your lucky stars because nothing was discovered. Either way, you're ahead of the game.
quotes.author: Charlotte Ross

quotes.text: If you look at the human condition today, not everyone is well fed, has access to good medical care, or the physical basics that provide for a healthy and a happy life.
quotes.author: Ralph Merkle

quotes.text: Passion, you see, can be destroyed by a doctor. It cannot be created.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.text: In the sick room, ten cents' worth of human understanding equals ten dollars' worth of medical science.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.text: Medical liability reform is not a Republican or Democrat issue or even a doctor versus lawyer issue. It is a patient issue.
quotes.author: John Ensign

quotes.text: The art of medicine was to be properly learned only from its practice and its exercise.
quotes.author: Thomas Sydenham

quotes.text: A pregnant woman facing the most dire circumstances must be able to count on her doctor to do what is medically necessary to protect her from serious physical harm.
quotes.author: Barbara Mikulski

quotes.text: I got the bill for my surgery. Now I know what those doctors were wearing masks for.
quotes.author: James H. Boren

quotes.text: Honestly, being a doctor could make you more close minded than regular people.
quotes.author: Alex Chiu

quotes.text: As a physician, I know many doctors want to utilize new technology, but they find the cost prohibitive.
quotes.author: Nathan Deal

quotes.text: I regret to this day that I never went to college. I feel I should have been a doctor.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.text: One has a greater sense of degradation after an interview with a doctor than from any human experience.
quotes.author: Alice James

quotes.text: Doctors coin money when they do procedures but family medicine doesn't have any procedures.
quotes.author: David Jones

quotes.text: If you want total security, go to prison. There you're fed, clothed, given medical care and so on. The only thing lacking... is freedom.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: You know, if I listened to Michael Dukakis long enough, I would be convinced we're in an economic downturn and people are homeless and going without food and medical attention and that we've got to do something about the unemployed.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: These technologies can make life easier, can let us touch people we might not otherwise. You may have a child with a birth defect and be able to get in touch with other parents and support groups, get medical information, the latest experimental drugs. These things can profoundly influence life. I'm not downplaying that.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We can't get to the $4 trillion in savings that we need by just cutting the 12 percent of the budget that pays for things like medical research and education funding and food inspectors and the weather service. And we can't just do it by making seniors pay more for Medicare.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I had the privilege of practicing medicine in the early '60s, before we had any government. It worked rather well, and there was nobody on the street suffering with no medical care.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: If you're so pro-life, do me a favour: don't lock arms and block medical clinics. If you're so pro-life, lock arms and block cemeteries.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.text: Whenever the people are for gay marriage or medical marijuana or assisted suicide, suddenly the 'will of the people' goes out the window.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.text: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.text: Vaccination is the medical sacrament corresponding to baptism. Whether it is or is not more efficacious I do not know.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Folks, the most insidious part of this whole health care scheme is that all of these vast medical expenditures will become nothing more than government budget items. We individuals will no longer exist. The relationship between a government and citizen will change forever.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.text: A Harvard Medical School study has determined that rectal thermometers are still the best way to tell a baby's temperature. Plus, it really teaches the baby who's boss.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.text: I went to medical school because I wanted to ask the big questions. Do we have a soul? Does God exist? What happens after death?
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: No one should have to choose between medicine and other necessities. No one should have to use the emergency room every time a child gets sick. And no one should have to live in constant fear that a medical problem will become a financial crisis.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.text: Medical science has proven time and again that when the resources are provided, great progress in the treatment, cure, and prevention of disease can occur.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: It seems sensible to me that we should look to the medical profession, that over the centuries has helped us to live longer and healthier lives, to help us die peacefully among our loved ones in our own home without a long stay in God's waiting room.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I believe it should be possible for someone stricken with a serious and ultimately fatal illness to choose to die peacefully with medical help, rather than suffer.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Finish last in your league and they call you idiot. Finish last in medical school and they call you doctor.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.text: A retired teacher paid $62,000 towards her pension and nothing, yes nothing, for full family medical, dental and vision coverage over her entire career. What will we pay her? $1.4 million in pension benefits and another $215,000 in health care benefit premiums over her lifetime.
quotes.author: Chris Christie

quotes.text: The medical literature tells us that the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease, cancer, stroke, diabetes, Alzheimer's, and many more problems are through healthy diet and exercise. Our bodies have evolved to move, yet we now use the energy in oil instead of muscles to do our work.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Against the State, against the Church, against the silence of the medical profession, against the whole machinery of dead institutions of the past, the woman of today arises.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.text: Stay out of the sun, because it is the worst thing in terms of aging. I'm very medical. I come from a medical family.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.text: What's important at the grocery store is just as important in engines or medical systems. If the customer isn't satisfied, if the stuff is getting stale, if the shelf isn't right, or if the offerings aren't right, it's the same thing. You manage it like a small organization. You don't get hung up on zeros.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Information on how to heal autism and how to possibly delay vaccines or prevent autism shouldn't come from me. It should come from the medical establishment.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: I have been recently diagnosed with Sjogren's Syndrome, an autoimmune disease which is an ongoing medical condition that affects my energy level and causes fatigue and joint pain.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.text: Civil and political rights are critical, but not often the real problem for the destitute sick. My patients in Haiti can now vote but they can't get medical care or clean water.
quotes.author: Paul Farmer

quotes.text: I know we can't always know what medical surprises may happen during childbirth. But my hope is to go fully natural - no epidural, no interventions. Wish me luck.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: But I contend that if we're providing total medical coverage for every man, woman, and child in Iraq, shouldn't we at least be doing the same thing for every man, woman, and child in the United States?
quotes.author: Tony Campolo

quotes.text: Money has transformed every watchdog, every independent authority. Medical doctors are increasingly gulled by the lobbying of pharmaceutical salesmen.
quotes.author: Thomas Frank

quotes.text: Liberal that I am, I support health-care reform on its merits alone. My liberal blood boils, for example, when I read that half of the personal bankruptcies in this country are brought on, in part, by medical expenses.
quotes.author: Thomas Frank

quotes.text: My dad's a doctor, and when I was 8, I went to one of his medical conferences where they were demonstrating laser surgery on a chicken. I was so mad that a chicken had to die, I never ate meat again.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.text: I first wanted to be a psychiatrist. I decided against that in medical school when I discovered that psychiatrists didn't, in reality, do what they did on TV.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.text: Over the years my mother's steadfast faith in God has inspired me, particularly when I had to perform extremely difficult surgical procedures or when I found myself faced with my own medical scare.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.text: I think first and foremost everybody should understand that Canadians are strongly committed to the system of universal health insurance, to the principle that your ability to pay does not determine your access to critical medical service.
quotes.author: Stephen Harper

quotes.text: The best way to reduce the cost of medical care is to reduce the illness.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.text: If we can reduce the cost and improve the quality of medical technology through advances in nanotechnology, we can more widely address the medical conditions that are prevalent and reduce the level of human suffering.
quotes.author: Ralph Merkle

quotes.text: My parents and grandparents have always been engaged in teaching or the medical profession or the priesthood, so I've sort of grown up with a sense of complicity in the lives of other people, so there's no virtue in that it's the way one is raised.
quotes.author: Colin Firth

quotes.text: Medical knowledge and technical savvy are biodegradable. The sort of medicine that was practiced in Boston or New York or Atlanta fifty years ago would be as strange to a medical student or intern today as the ceremonial dance of a !Kung San tribe would seem to a rock festival audience in Hackensack.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: The dilemma of modern medicine, and the underlying central flaw in medical education and, most of all, in the training of interns, is the irresistible drive to do something, anything. It is expected by patients and too often agreed to by their doctors, in the face of ignorance.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: It worries me about our unwillingness to really address reforms and modernization in Medicare. This thing was designed 37 years ago. It has not evolved to keep pace with current medical technology.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.text: Mind you, I've always been a very off-message type of fat broad one who gladly admits she reached the size she is now solely through lack of discipline and love of pleasure, and who rather despises people (except those with proven medical conditions) who pretend that it is generally otherwise.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: One goes through school, college, medical school and one's internship learning little or nothing about goodness but a good deal about success.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: There have been some medical schools in which somewhere along the assembly line, a faculty member has informed the students, not so much by what he said but by what he did, that there is an intimate relation between curing and caring.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: It is clear that the pharmaceutical industry is not, by any stretch of the imagination, doing enough to ensure that the poor have access to adequate medical care.
quotes.author: Paul Farmer

quotes.text: The main reason for the failure of the modern medical science is that it is dealing with results and not causes. Nothing more than the patching up of those attacked and the burying of those who are slain, without a thought being given to the real strong hold.
quotes.author: Edward Bach

quotes.text: I read Freud's Introductory Lectures in Psychoanalysis in basically one sitting. I decided to enroll in medical school. It was almost like a conversion experience.
quotes.author: Stanislav Grof

quotes.text: Citizens must pressure the American Hospital Association, the American Public Health Association, the Centers for Disease Control and other relevant governmental agencies to make greening our hospitals and medical centers a top priority so that they themselves don't create even more illness.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: We need to accept the seemingly obvious fact that a toxic environment can make people sick and that no amount of medical intervention can protect us. The health care community must become a powerful political lobby for environmental policy and legislation.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: I have written two medical novels. I have never studied medicine, never seen an operation.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.text: Medical debts are the number-one cause of bankruptcy in America.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.text: I took anatomy classes. I went to medical libraries and talked to doctors and nutritionists. I did the whole thing before using myself as a human guinea pig.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.text: The patient's autonomy always, always should be respected, even if it is absolutely contrary - the decision is contrary to best medical advice and what the physician wants.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.text: I'm trying to knock the medical profession into accepting its responsibilities, and those responsibilities include assisting their patients with death.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.text: And as a nurse, I know very well the importance, for example, of electronic medical records.
quotes.author: Lois Capps

quotes.text: I mean, everybody should have access to medical care. And, you know, it shouldn't be such a big deal.
quotes.author: Paul Farmer

quotes.text: Researches tested a new form of medical marijuana that treats pain but doesn't get the user high, prompting patients who need medical marijuana to declare, 'Thank you?'
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.text: As far as hypnosis is concerned, I had a very serious problem when I was in my twenties. I encountered a man who later became the president of the American Society of Medical Hypnosis. He couldn't hypnotize me.
quotes.author: Theodore Sturgeon

quotes.text: No lying knight or lying priest ever prospered in any age, but especially not in the dark ones. Men prospered then only in following an openly declared purpose, and preaching candidly beloved and trusted creeds.

quotes.text: We all fight over what the label 'feminism' means but for me it's about empowerment. It's not about being more powerful than men - it's about having equal rights with protection, support, justice. It's about very basic things. It's not a badge like a fashion item.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: Nothing doth more hurt in a state than that cunning men pass for wise.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: It is a sad thing when men have neither the wit to speak well nor the judgment to hold their tongues.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: Men often take their imagination for their heart and they believe they are converted as soon as they think of being converted.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Many men are contemptuous of riches few can give them away.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: When women are depressed, they eat or go shopping. Men invade another country. It's a whole different way of thinking.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: There are but very few men clever enough to know all the mischief they do.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: The production of children, the nurture of those born, and the daily life of men, of these matters woman is visibly the cause.

quotes.text: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.

quotes.text: A good part - and definitely the most fun part - of being a feminist is about frightening men.

quotes.text: If boyhood and youth are but vanity, must it not be our ambition to become men?

quotes.text: Monkeys are superior to men in this: when a monkey looks into a mirror, he sees a monkey.

quotes.text: We do not want the men of another color for our brothers-in-law, but we do want them for our brothers.

quotes.text: Money is the worst currency that ever grew among mankind. This sacks cities, this drives men from their homes, this teaches and corrupts the worthiest minds to turn base deeds.

quotes.text: A great deal of talent is lost to the world for want of a little courage. Every day sends to their graves obscure men whose timidity prevented them from making a first effort.

quotes.text: All men are liable to error and most men are, in many points, by passion or interest, under temptation to it.

quotes.text: Man is not the creature of circumstances, circumstances are the creatures of men. We are free agents, and man is more powerful than matter.

quotes.text: Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon. July 1969 AD. We came in peace for all mankind.

quotes.text: But men must know, that in this theatre of man's life it is reserved only for God and angels to be lookers on.

quotes.text: Men are able to trust one another, knowing the exact degree of dishonesty they are entitled to expect.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.text: When I was younger, I was terrified to express anger because it would often kick-start a horrible reaction in the men in my life. So I bit my tongue. I was left to painstakingly deal with the aftermath of my avoidance later in life, in therapy or through the lyrics of my songs.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Men know everything - all of them - all the time - no matter how stupid or inexperienced or arrogant or ignorant they are.

quotes.text: Women's fashion is a subtle form of bondage. It's men's way of binding them. We put them in these tight, high-heeled shoes, we make them wear these tight clothes and we say they look sexy. But they're actually tied up.

quotes.text: All men of action are dreamers.
quotes.author: James Huneker

quotes.text: Justice consists in doing no injury to men decency in giving them no offense.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: There are more men ennobled by study than by nature.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: We must conceive of this whole universe as one commonwealth of which both gods and men are members.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: The worst men often give the best advice.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Men will bear many things from a kept mistress, which they would not bear from a wife.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.text: I do not wish women to have power over men but over themselves.

quotes.text: Old men are fond of giving good advice to console themselves for their inability to give bad examples.

quotes.text: It is easier to know men in general, than men in particular.

quotes.text: No longer shall I paint interiors with men reading and women knitting. I will paint living people who breathe and feel and suffer and love.

quotes.text: There are a great many men valued in society who have nothing to recommend them but serviceable vices.

quotes.text: There is nothing men are so generous of as advice.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: Men know they are sexual exiles. They wander the earth seeking satisfaction, craving and despising, never content. There is nothing in that anguished motion for women to envy.

quotes.text: No men are oftener wrong than those that can least bear to be so.

quotes.text: We are all strong enough to bear other men's misfortunes.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: Though men are apt to flatter and exalt themselves with their great achievements, yet these are, in truth, very often owing not so much to design as chance.

quotes.text: As to the deceit perpetrated upon women, let it pass, for, when love is in the way, men and women as a general rule dupe each other.

quotes.text: What is most important for democracy is not that great fortunes should not exist, but that great fortunes should not remain in the same hands. In that way there are rich men, but they do not form a class.

quotes.text: The vote is the most powerful instrument ever devised by man for breaking down injustice and destroying the terrible walls which imprison men because they are different from other men.

quotes.text: We should have a State in which we could live and breathe as free men and which we could develop according to our own lights and culture and where principles of Islamic social justice could find free play.

quotes.text: When men sow the wind it is rational to expect that they will reap the whirlwind.

quotes.text: Education then, beyond all other devices of human origin, is the great equalizer of the conditions of men, the balance-wheel of the social machinery.

quotes.text: Fame and power are the objects of all men. Even their partial fruition is gained by very few and that, too, at the expense of social pleasure, health, conscience, life.

quotes.text: As Americans, we don't see the role of government as guaranteeing outcomes, but allowing free men and women to flourish based on their own vision, their hard work and their personal responsibility.

quotes.text: Wise men make more opportunities than they find.

quotes.text: Men who want to support women in our struggle for freedom and justice should understand that it is not terrifically important to us that they learn to cry it is important to us that they stop the crimes of violence against us.

quotes.text: What is the price of experience? Do men buy it for a song? Or wisdom for a dance in the street? No, it is bought with the price of all the man hath, his house, his wife, his children.

quotes.text: Men die in despair, while spirits die in ecstasy.

quotes.text: Punishment is now unfashionable... because it creates moral distinctions among men, which, to the democratic mind, are odious. We prefer a meaningless collective guilt to a meaningful individual responsibility.

quotes.text: It disturbs me no more to find men base, unjust, or selfish than to see apes mischievous, wolves savage, or the vulture ravenous.

quotes.text: An artist needn't be a clergyman or a churchwarden, but he certainly must have a warm heart for his fellow men.

quotes.text: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist.

quotes.text: Labor disgraces no man unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor.

quotes.text: We cannot learn men from books.

quotes.text: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.

quotes.text: Most men are individuals no longer so far as their business, its activities, or its moralities are concerned. They are not units but fractions.

quotes.text: It is not because angels are holier than men or devils that makes them angels, but because they do not expect holiness from one another, but from God only.

quotes.text: The unique and supreme voluptuousness of love lies in the certainty of committing evil. And men and women know from birth that in evil is found all sensual delight.

quotes.text: I have known more men destroyed by the desire to have wife and child and to keep them in comfort than I have seen destroyed by drink and harlots.

quotes.text: It is not true that suffering ennobles the character happiness does that sometimes, but suffering for the most part, makes men petty and vindictive.

quotes.text: It is a clear truth that those who every day barter away other men's liberty will soon care little for their own.

quotes.text: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it.

quotes.text: The only language men ever speak perfectly is the one they learn in babyhood, when no one can teach them anything!

quotes.text: The average bright young man who is drafted hates the whole business because an army always tries to eliminate the individual differences in men.

quotes.text: I have known war as few men now living know it. It's very destructiveness on both friend and foe has rendered it useless as a means of settling international disputes.

quotes.text: Men, their rights, and nothing more women, their rights, and nothing less.

quotes.text: Women, as they grow older, rely more and more on cosmetics. Men, as they grow older, rely more and more on a sense of humor.

quotes.text: I once heard two ladies going on and on about the pains of childbirth and how men don't seem to know what real pain is. I asked if either of them ever got themselves caught in a zipper.

quotes.text: To judge from the notions expounded by theologians, one must conclude that God created most men simply with a view to crowding hell.

quotes.text: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom.

quotes.text: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.

quotes.text: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.

quotes.text: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older.

quotes.text: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.

quotes.text: A fool and his money are soon parted.

quotes.text: Do what you love and the money will follow.

quotes.text: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money.

quotes.text: Money is a mechanism for control.

quotes.text: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.

quotes.text: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all.

quotes.text: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count.

quotes.text: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money.

quotes.text: Fame, I have already. Now I need the money.

quotes.text: I don't spend much money on clothes I never did.

quotes.text: Sooner or later, we sell out for money.

quotes.text: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough.

quotes.text: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.

quotes.text: I think everything depends on money.

quotes.text: Art for art's sake, money for God's sake.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.text: Business is other people's money.

quotes.text: A fool and his money get a lot of publicity.

quotes.text: Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money.

quotes.text: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.

quotes.text: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.

quotes.text: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.

quotes.text: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.

quotes.text: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money.

quotes.text: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.

quotes.text: Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.

quotes.text: I try to give to the poor people for love what the rich could get for money. No, I wouldn't touch a leper for a thousand pounds yet I willingly cure him for the love of God.

quotes.text: We have the best government that money can buy.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I can make more generals, but horses cost money.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.

quotes.text: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: I've never been able to understand why a Republican contributor is a 'fat cat' and a Democratic contributor of the same amount of money is a 'public-spirited philanthropist'.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better.

quotes.text: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: America... just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.text: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: A fool and his money are soon elected.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: The rich are always going to say that, you know, just give us more money and we'll go out and spend more and then it will all trickle down to the rest of you. But that has not worked the last 10 years, and I hope the American public is catching on.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.

quotes.text: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.

quotes.text: There is only one class in the community that thinks more about money than the rich, and that is the poor. The poor can think of nothing else.

quotes.text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Government always finds a need for whatever money it gets.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: I spent three days a week for 10 years educating myself in the public library, and it's better than college. People should educate themselves - you can get a complete education for no money. At the end of 10 years, I had read every book in the library and I'd written a thousand stories.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it. You can have all the money in the world, but if you are not a moral and ethical person, you really have nothing.
