quotes.text: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Money and success don't change people they merely amplify what is already there.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: An actress is not a machine, but they treat you like a machine. A money machine.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Remember that credit is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The use of money is all the advantage there is in having it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Money often costs too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.text: Friendship and money: oil and water.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.text: Ultimately, if you can say that I'm a bad owner and we're winning championships, I can live with that. But if we're not making the playoffs and we're spending and losing money, then I have to look in the mirror and say maybe I'm not taking the necessary steps to doing what it takes to run an organization.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: When I chased after money, I never had enough. When I got my life on purpose and focused on giving of myself and everything that arrived into my life, then I was prosperous.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: I've always felt toward the slightest scene, even if all I had to do in a scene was just to come in and say, 'Hi,' that the people ought to get their money's worth and that this is an obligation of mine, to give them the best you can get from me.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: When the federal government spends more each year than it collects in tax revenues, it has three choices: It can raise taxes, print money, or borrow money. While these actions may benefit politicians, all three options are bad for average Americans.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I try to treat all the money I'm making like it's the last time I'm going to make it.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Instead of giving money to found colleges to promote learning, why don't they pass a constitutional amendment prohibiting anybody from learning anything? If it works as good as the Prohibition one did, why, in five years we would have the smartest race of people on earth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: It's hard to tell with these Internet startups if they're really interested in building companies or if they're just interested in the money. I can tell you, though: If they don't really want to build a company, they won't luck into it. That's because it's so hard that if you don't have a passion, you'll give up.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Lack of money is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Modern poets talk against business, poor things, but all of us write for money. Beginners are subjected to trial by market.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: When a man says money can do anything, that settles it: he hasn't got any.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: We are the only real aristocracy in the world: the aristocracy of money.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Don't bring your need to the marketplace, bring your skill. If you don't feel well, tell your doctor, but not the marketplace. If you need money, go to the bank, but not the marketplace.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: If I win and get the money, then the Oakland Police department is going to buy a boys' home, me a house, my family a house, and a Stop Police Brutality Center.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day and not reopen it for five years.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I actually thought that it would be a little confusing during the same period of your life to be in one meeting when you're trying to make money, and then go to another meeting where you're giving it away. I mean is it gonna erode your ability, you know, to make money? Are you gonna somehow get confused about what you're trying to do?
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Innovation has nothing to do with how many R amp& D dollars you have. When Apple came up with the Mac, IBM was spending at least 100 times more on R &amp D. It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: This will never be a civilized country until we spend more money for books than we do for chewing gum.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: You know, my main reaction to this money thing is that it's humorous, all the attention to it, because it's hardly the most insightful or valuable thing that's happened to me.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: What is a normal childhood? We weren't rich, we were pretty middle-class. My dad survived from job to job with him taking care of so many relatives, he couldn't save any money.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.text: We need earmark reform, and when I'm President, I will go line by line to make sure that we are not spending money unwisely.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: My restaurants are never opened on Thanksgiving I want my staff to spend time with their family if they can. My feeling is, if I can't figure out how to make money the rest of the year so that my workers can enjoy the holidays, then I don't deserve to be an owner.
quotes.author: Michael Symon

quotes.text: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.text: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Money doesn't talk, it swears.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: With our technology, with objects, literally three people in a garage can blow away what 200 people at Microsoft can do. Literally can blow it away. Corporate America has a need that is so huge and can save them so much money, or make them so much money, or cost them so much money if they miss it, that they are going to fuel the object revolution.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: This film cost $31 million. With that kind of money I could have invaded some country.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The reason we have poverty is that we have no imagination. There are a great many people accumulating what they think is vast wealth, but it's only money... they don't know how to enjoy it, because they have no imagination.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: No one in this world has ever lost money by underestimating the intelligence of the great masses of the plain people. Nor has anyone ever lost public office thereby.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: The circulation of confidence is better than the circulation of money.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.text: I spent my whole life in the private sector, 25 years in the private sector. I understand that when government takes more money out of the hands of people, it makes it more difficult for them to buy things. If they can't buy things, the economy doesn't grow. If the economy doesn't grow, we don't put Americans to work.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Let advertisers spend the same amount of money improving their product that they do on advertising and they wouldn't have to advertise it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Money without brains is always dangerous.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Of course, to have money is just great because you can do what you think is important to you. I always was a rich person because money's not related to happiness.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Business, that's easily defined - it's other people's money.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions he had money as well.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: I'm sick of giving creeps money off my soul.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The Internet didn't get invented on its own. Government research created the Internet so that all the companies could make money off the Internet. The point is, is that when we succeed, we succeed because of our individual initiative, but also because we do things together.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Money and women are the most sought after and the least known about of any two things we have.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I think it's too bad that everybody's decided to turn on drugs, I don't think drugs are the problem. Crime is the problem. Cops are the problem. Money's the problem. But drugs are just drugs.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: President Obama's view of a free economy is to send your money to his friends. My vision for a free enterprise economy is to return entrepreneurship and genius and creativity to the American people!
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: A system of capitalism presumes sound money, not fiat money manipulated by a central bank. Capitalism cherishes voluntary contracts and interest rates that are determined by savings, not credit creation by a central bank.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I know that campaigns can seem small, and even silly. Trivial things become big distractions. Serious issues become sound bites. And the truth gets buried under an avalanche of money and advertising. If you're sick of hearing me approve this message, believe me - so am I.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: You can choose a future where more Americans have the chance to gain the skills they need to compete, no matter how old they are or how much money they have. Education was the gateway to opportunity for me. It was the gateway for Michelle. And now more than ever, it is the gateway to a middle-class life.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I've never preached one sermon on money, on just finances. I want to stay away from it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: In liberal logic, if life is unfair then the answer is to turn more tax money over to politicians, to spend in ways that will increase their chances of getting reelected.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: I don't believe we are supposed to go through life defeated and not having enough money to pay our bills or send our kids to college.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.text: There are necessary evils. Money is an important thing in terms of representing freedom in our world. And now I have a daughter to think about. It's really the first time I've thought about the future and what it could be.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: I don't mind saying, you know, that I don't take a salary from the church, and God has blessed me with more money than I could imagine from my books.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You may never get to that perfect world that you're waiting for where everything's going to be perfect and you got that much money and your house paid off.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: Now workers should have the right to join unions. But unions should not be forced upon workers. And unions should not have the power to take money our of their members' paychecks to buy the support of politicians that are favored by the union bosses.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Talk is by far the most accessible of pleasures. It costs nothing in money, it is all profit, it completes our education, founds and fosters our friendships, and can be enjoyed at any age and in almost any state of health.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: I don't blame the players today for the money. I blame the owners. They started it. They wanna give it to 'em? More power to 'em.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: It's amazing how people will give when you don't ask. Many of them send money because they believe in the message.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.text: One does not need buildings, money, power, or status to practice the Art of Peace. Heaven is right where you are standing, and that is the place to train.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: The chief value of money lies in the fact that one lives in a world in which it is overestimated.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: I've seen the ticket, and I still can't believe it. When I see the money, I hope I don't hit the floor.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: Money is human happiness in the abstract he, then, who is no longer capable of enjoying human happiness in the concrete devotes himself utterly to money.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: As one digs deeper into the national character of the Americans, one sees that they have sought the value of everything in this world only in the answer to this single question: how much money will it bring in?
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.text: I can inspire people on how to use money, how to get economically powerful.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: A real gentleman, even if he loses everything he owns, must show no emotion. Money must be so far beneath a gentleman that it is hardly worth troubling about.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: I don't think the money people in Hollywood have ever thought I was normal, but I am dedicated to my work and that's what counts.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: If all the rich and all of the church people should send their children to the public schools they would feel bound to concentrate their money on improving these schools until they met the highest ideals.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: Well private money can take risks in a way that government money often isn't willing to.
quotes.author: Bill Gates
